Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: I've had the new 8.9" Fire HDX for about two weeks.  It's great.  I was looking for something as flexible as possible, but I really wanted to have a good video service for off-line viewing as well as on-line.  I wanted something that I could use in the gym, moving vehicles, etc.  I checked out various tablets before making my decision and I definitely made the right one.  People in stores don't know much about Amazon's products and really only want to sell iPads and other Android tablets, especially Samsung.  The Samsung Galaxy note is a great tablet, but no other video service is as good as Amazon's and you can't get it on other Androids.  I have watched videos via both streaming and after downloading and it works really well both ways.  I've streamed video at home where I have 30 MB/sec service and at a place with about 1 MB/sec service and was surprised at how well it worked even there. I have a Prime membership, and that makes the Fire even better.  It was very easy to set up my home email on it and that works well too.  The Silk browser works well and so far I've experienced no problems as a result of it not supporting Flash.  If a website has small type, you can zoom with a stretching motion with your fingers as with some other tablets.  We have a 2013 Samsung smart TV and the second screen feature works exactly as advertised - pretty cool.  I haven't tried the WiDi/Miracast feature yet and also haven't tried to import other music yet, but will do so soon.  The battery lasts as long as they say.  Also have the origami cover and like it a lot as well.  I've briefly tried Officesuite Professional 7, but so far only to view a Word document (docx) and that worked fine. Personally, I'd much rather use a laptop for any serious work than any tablet on the market, but at least this gives some ability to work if you need it.  The build quality seems excellent (for the cover too), the screen is great, and the sound quality is great.  With its quad core processor, it is very responsive and natural to use.  I haven't found anything negative yet. I'm extremely happy with it.
Reviews.Title: Fire HDX is a great product!

Reviews.Author: meowloricat
Reviews.Content: Love it! Fast, easy, clear. I own second generation kindle and this new kindle fire 8.9 HDX. Bought the 32 with special offers.  Wasn't sure if special offers were taking up memory. Used May day button and received fast answer of no. Fast response and very helpful. Easy to setup WiFi connection. Set up 2email boxes into one combined box. Clear, sharp display. Great present to myself! Haven't had any problems and would recommend.
Reviews.Title: Love it!

Reviews.Author: Blaine Butenhoff
Reviews.Content: We have had ours since the day they shipped, and received ours exactly when they said it would arrive, November 7th.  Admittedly, this is my first kindle, and it has not disappointed. Video is beautiful, web surfing is way better than my ipad(2), it has a great interface, which may take a bit to get used to, but certainly doesn't detract from the devise. I find the interface design perfectly suited for both the size and functionality of the kindle.  I have the 8.9", 64gb ad-free version. Opening/closing apps, browsing the Internet, reading, etc respond extremely fast to the touch. I have had a really hard time picking up my ipad since purchasing the HDX (I write this review on the ipad, however, due to my wife reading on the HDX). We also bought the hardback/leather flap case as well, which fits on in seconds, no fumbling with clipping it in place, and is equally easy to remove if necessary. I find this to be a fantastic product; not only is it well worth the purchase price (it feels to me like you get more than what amazon just advertises about it) but also the time invested in using this devise since we've had it! I would highly recommend this to anybody who's looking for a different tablet to try, as well as anyone who uses Amazon's services (prime, streaming video, cloud, etc); I've found their interaction through the kindle HDX to be quite enjoyable.  Quite thrilled with this!
Reviews.Title: Fantastic product; thrilled with what we have!

Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: I've had this for a couple of days now and have been putting it through its paces.  There are some really great things about it and some not very great things about it.Owned Gadgets:Kindle PaperwhiteSero 7 ProNexus 7 2012Ipad 2Iconia A500Pros:*The biggest plus is the screen.  This is the first HD device I've owned and it makes a huge difference.  I browsed the web, read books, etc. and it felt and looked great.  I then picked up my iPad 2 to do some similar things and it was blah.*Speed and smoothness!  It's much speedier and smoother than any of my other devices.*I actually like the OS.  Quick access to most used apps, recently used apps, and content tabs on one page.  It's very different from iOS and Android which use folders and pages to organize apps and content.*Having it tapped in to the Amazon ecosystem is great (I'm a prime member).Cons:*My device has rebooted 7 or 8 times for reasons I can't figure out.  Some reboots were before I loaded any other apps and some after.  I've had reboots opening settings, silk, and camera app.  Some happened while I was in the middle of a show or listening to music.  Kind of frustrating.*This one doesn't bother me as much, but there's a slight flicker to my screen when going from a white background to a darker like the home page.  It's like it's trying to dim down as if it was doing an auto-brightness adjustment and finally settles (I never use auto, I just manually change brightness if I feel like I need to so I can better conserve battery).*App selection is limited and at least one app, Splashtop one of my faves, doesn't work as well as on iOS and Android.Neither Here Nor There:*There is no quickoffice app that gives you editing abilities like I thought there would be (I read all of the product info I just misinterpreted it.  Why advertise office "reading" software as a perk, right?  So I just assumed.)  This didn't bother me much as I've always used and even prefer Kingsoft Office which is free and works just fine on the hdx.*There is no Youtube app and Youtube on the Silk browser stinks.  The videos look worse than on my low res iPad 2.  However, I found a tolerable third party app that gets the job done.I am keeping an eye on it and I'd be interested to know if anyone else has experienced any of my cons.  Perhaps I have one that's a little off?
Reviews.Title: Almost Great?

Reviews.Author: Nereus
Reviews.Content: My wife purchased this tablet for me. While this tablet is, in my opinion, currently without equal as a media tablet, I was surprised to find that the in-built Office Suite did not have the ability to *produce* anything - it only has document viewing capability, meaning that you cannot edit/author documents such as spreadsheets using the built-in Office Suite. The line that misled me (and numerous others) was this:"Stay productive on the go with ultra-fast web browsing, built-in Office Suite, plus e-mail and calendar support for Gmail, Outlook, and more."Kind of difficult to 'stay productive' with an Office Suite that can't actually produce anything!Please be aware that if you are expecting fully functional Office Suite productivity with this tablet (word processor, spreadsheets etc), it is NOT included, and you have to pay for additional app(s) to enable full Office Suite functionality, albeit some for as little as $5.This review is intended to help those who, like me, require that functionality in a tablet, and would prefer to know these facts *before* purchasing the tablet. Please consider this simple fact before marking this review as unhelpful and/or making ad hominem attacks in the comments section. Thank you.
Reviews.Title: Nice tablet. Note: full Office Suite functionality is not included.

Reviews.Author: A K Martin
Reviews.Content: Just bought the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" for business and entertainment - I travel a lot and was hoping to be able to use this device for my business e-mail rather than carrying a laptop with me. The advertising for the Kindle claims that it can receive e-mails and Office Docs. Turns out the Kindle won't open any Office docs if they are mailed to my normal business e-mail address. According to the tech support person I reached through the live chat feature, any e-mails with Office attachments have to be sent to my '@kindle' e-mail address with the word 'convert' in the subject line! This is quite impractical when receiving files from customers and clients - it means I have to e-mail them back and request they send the attachment again to a strange address - extremely unprofessional. The support persons other suggestion was to receive the mails at my computer and then froward them to my kindle e-mail address - kind of defeats the object of a tablet as it means I have to carry my laptop with me anyway. Once again, the Kindle disappoints as something other than a play thing for games or watching movies.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX does not work with e-mailed Office documents

Reviews.Author: Stephen
Reviews.Content: I have been using a Motorola Xoom as my go to media device for about 2 years now. My only complaints being that is quite heavy in the hands when reading books or magazines, and it is a little bit on the slow side when multiple apps are running in the background.So I decided to do some research on the latest (greatest?) tablets on the market. I am not a fan of the Apple ecosystem so the iPad (mini or other) was out of the question. My wife as the 2nd generation Kindle Fire and loves it...me not so much. It's good for what it does, but I'm not a fan of the Kindle overlay on top of the android OS. I had a feeling that this newer version would be similar, but I wasn't sure so I decided to give it a test drive.First let me say that this tablet is super light-weight! It makes my Xoom feel like a 10lb dumbbell. Not only is it light, but it is very thin (maybe even thinner than the iPad Mini). The tablet is super fast and smooth. There was absolutely no lag as I switched between screens and apps. Surfing webpages was effortless and there was little to no load times. The tablet is an excellent media device and I would definitely recommend it to anyone that is already using or thinking about signing up for Amazon Prime.Well why 4 stars then?! As with the original Kindle Fire and all of it's newer versions, I just can't get into the customized layout that Kindle has ontop of Android's OS. I am one of those people that absolutely hates the "Kindle Carousel"! I much prefer a clean and simple interface that I can customize to my liking.I would give the tablet 4.5 stars, but that wasn't an option. All in all I would say that the new Kindle Fire HDX is about as excellent a tablet as one can buy (if you like that crazy carousel) and I would certainly recommend it.
Reviews.Title: This tablet WOW'ed me...but,

Reviews.Author: Michael Bigger
Reviews.Content: (Bought 2 * 32 GB for my kids and 1 *64 Gb for myself, all wi-fi, 3 Origami covers)The big drivers for this tablet are its light weight, the amazing screen quality and resolution, and its speed (fast with no lags). I haven't used Mayday, so I can't comment on it.The device's weight and how it feels in your hands makes me want to hold the device without a cover. I bought one Origami cover initially and I will go against the current and state that this is a great cover because it is a breeze to take the device in and out of the cover; As simple as putting and removing a magnetic strip on a fridge. I want to hold the device in my hands because it feels great and it is super light. For me the cover is great for protecting the device when not in use. A great deal of effort goes into making a tablet feel good in the hands, why should I not enjoy it? My kids like the cover so much, I ordered 2 additional covers.The screen is amazing. DisplayMate did a tablet screen study. You can check the metrics at [...] Just amazing...Some tidbits...The Fling feature, Goodreads, ...: We really like the latest software upgrade to Mojito. It includes the "Fling" feature in the  Amazon shopping app. You can create a placeholder by flinging the picture of a product you are browsing to the bottom of the app for future reference. This feature improves the shopping experience.Goodreads, the reader social media platform is excellent.Some people have complained about the limitation on Prime Videos...To that I say Amazon offers some sweet deals on videos for purchase. I have no hesitation buying a few movies in addition to downloading some of the free stuff Amazon makes available for us. The value is unbeatableArea for improvement...Goodreads should be integrated in the tablet like it is on the Paperwhite.At full brightness, it gets hard to reads black text on a white background...not a biggie but I wish the text would pop out more.Superstar product, highly recommended.
Reviews.Title: The Drivers Making the HDX a 5 Stars Product

Reviews.Author: Shopper
Reviews.Content: I love the display!  The screen is very responsive.  It is a huge improvement over the Fire HD.  Mayday is so easy to use and the gentleman I talked to was super helpful, friendly and polite.  Thanks, Amazon!
Reviews.Title: Wonderful Product!

Reviews.Author: Keddie
Reviews.Content: Amazon offered me a 30 day trial of this item odd enough just 1 day after I packed up an iPad Air and said holy crap I want one of these.  Pulled it out of the box and I have to say for the first time in 4 years Apple lost a product competition to me.  This thing is lighter, cleaner, and just overall better in almost every way.Now before all the Apple haters jump on me for this review hear me out.  Yes I know your precious little iPad does integrate directly into iTunes and transferring of Movies, Music, and Pictures is a snap.  However, this box does all of that too for anyone who know's how to use a PC or a Mac.  I personally have this attached to my 17" MacBook Pro now and transfer all my stuff with a single click as well.Pros:Amazon is finally giving me a "Usable" OS for the tablet market.  Fire OS RocksIntegrated Amazon Creds and access to all my needs such as Email, Facebook, Twitter, and every game on the Google Marketplace.It's VERY fastVivid colors and a super bright screen.CRAZY light.  13.6 oz on my scaleLove that there is no home button (My daughter always hits the button then throws the iPad because it exits her movie)  Yes I know theres guidance mode but I can't run this mode on an old iPad 1 because Apple decided updating to iOS 6 is not possible.Access to Amazon InstantMUCH Cheaper than iPad and has better battery life and processing.Cons:Not as large as iPad screenDoesn't integrate directly with iTunes.Camera's on front and back aren't great but NO mobile device has a ASPC sensor equipped.Doesn't have built in GPS but that's what my phone is for.Overall for the price you can't beat this device.
Reviews.Title: Not an iPad killer but close

Reviews.Author: Daveg61
Reviews.Content: Best decision I ever made.  Battery life is good, great picture.  Easy to use, you can do everything you need to.  If you're still thinking about one, stop thinking and order one..you won't be sorry!
Reviews.Title: love it!

Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I had an iPad. I gave it to my daughter. Bought my wife an iPad mini. Returned it. She is now using my Kindle7hd and loves it.Anyway, I tried out the iPad air and it was the same old same old. I was not impressed.Now for this unit. It is the same width screen when in landscape as the iPad air but with a higher resolution. How can 9.7 equal 8.9 you might ask. 4 to 3 vs 16 to 10 screen ratio is why. Now I can surf comfortably. I can read the net without zooming. Portrait reading is more like a book feel at 16:10 compared to 4:3. Format is sweet for movies. This thing is fast. The app store is smallish but has grown a lot and is still growing. 1 mobile market will get me whatever Google play store refuses to.ANDThis is one of the best you can buy right now relative to hardware. And it was 170 less than comparable iPad.I will never buy another iPad.This thing is sweeeeeeeeeeeeeeet.Instantly connected to my WiFi.fast fast fast and Crystal clear.
Reviews.Title: Fantastic

Reviews.Author: G. Murrill
Reviews.Content: Crisp, clear, sharp display,awesome sound and with customer service unmatched in the tablet world. All things considered, it's almost worth being limited to the Amazon universe where apps are concerned. I give it five stars base on how great it handles e-books and videos. But I'd take back half of a star because of all the great android apps that can't be found in Amazons app market. I'm sure that, in time, some of the great android apps I used on my previous tablet will make their way into Amazons app market. But for now, I'm holding back on giving the half star back
Reviews.Title: Light, fast, powerful.....A turbo charged beast of an e-reader in android clothing

Reviews.Author: Big Kahuna
Reviews.Content: I haven't had the kindle fire for very long, but I'm impressed with it's performance. The only downside I've seen is not being able to get more apps in the kindle store. They need to get more android apps into the kindle store or open up the kindle more to the outside apps. Hint, get the largest memory you can afford.
Reviews.Title: Great Tablet

Reviews.Author: Hallie girl
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire HDX.  It's so much better than my Paperwhite or my Kindle Fire.  This is my 3rd one.  The Paperwhite is great if you're only going to read; but again, it only shows the book titles in black & white and it was truly hard to remember which ones I had read as I usually purchase more than one at the time.  With the HDX, the books are shown in bright living color and easy to see what has been read and what hasn't.  What is frustrating is to delete duplicates (free games) from the stream on the homepage.  Will have to work on that.  It takes beautiful pictures and the color is amazing.  Even though I'm basically computer illiterate, I'm able to make this Kindle work pretty good.  So far, so good!  I would highly recommend it over the iPad - I guess I'm not an Apple user although I do use an iPhone.
Reviews.Title: A wonderful device

Reviews.Author: MCBCL10
Reviews.Content: Love it....cant keep the wife off it...every time I go to grab it....she shoos me like she is swatting flies!
Reviews.Title: Kindle fire hdx

Reviews.Author: John and Lauren
Reviews.Content: I'd give this product 5 stars! It is super fast and the color is great. Reading at night while my husband sleeps has never been easier! The screen does not strain my eyes at all. It's very light weight making it easy to read while laying down. The graphics on this device are very nice. The sound quality is pretty impressive compared to our other tablet. We are very satisfied with this purchase.
Reviews.Title: Great device!

Reviews.Author: Wickgeo "wickgeo"
Reviews.Content: I will not review all the features of the Kindle as that has been done very well by others. I do wish there was a charging light on the edge of the Kindle HDX 8.9 like my regular Kindle Fire.  With the cover closed you have to check inside for the battery charge.  Very minor issue.  I really didn't realize that the Special Offers would appear every time you turn on the Kindle.  I find it annoying and unattractive.  Does anybody know how to get rid of them?  I am sure others probably like the feature but I would prefer to just see a screensaver not an ad.
Reviews.Title: I love the Kindle but do NOT like the Special Offers

Reviews.Author: Fergie
Reviews.Content: This is a super-slim, lightweight multi-functional Android-based tablet. The screen resolution and color is dazzling.  Connect to the Internet, play downloaded games or music, read books, or take photographs or video - it does it all.My suggestion - buy an e-book user manual, install the Kindle Reader app for PC to your computer, and then download the manual to your computer (we bought "The Kindle Fire HDX User Guide" by Charles Tulley ($2.99)).  Take the time to read the user manual BEFORE you futz with the device.The Kindle Fire HDX is pretty intuitive..... any tech-savy teenager or twenty-something will figure out the basics in just an hour or so.  But, if you want to save yourself grief, read a user manual and find out how to do things correctly.  That way, you won't end up with a frozen or goobered device,  the result of doing something horribly wrong (like a bad sync with Windows Media Player).Users should also be aware of the re-boot process..... holding down the on/off button for a full 20 seconds;  it will back you out of many (if not most) problems that you'll encounter.Finally, bookmark the Amazon.com "Help" and "Help Forum" sites for Kindle Fire HDX on your computer.  The answer to just about any question, and solution to just about any problem, can be found on those sites.Overall:  Kindle Fire HDX 8.9"......  it's just amazingly excellent.Final Thoughts:  You really need security software on any device that connects to the Internet.  We downloaded the free ESET Mobile Security app from the App Store.  If your Kindle has 3G/4G wireless capability, the ESET software also provides an anti-theft feature.  If your Kindle is only WiFi capable, consider the free Locked and Found (Geek Squad) app to remotely lock and help you recover your device if it is ever lost or stolen.
Reviews.Title: Amazing

Reviews.Author: CookieCocoChanel "KMH"
Reviews.Content: My second kindle fire has 64GBP. I returned 1st one within the 30 days because of WiFi issues getting booted off constantly. It was not my WiFi. Amazon replaced it w/o a blink. Since this is my 1st kindle, I just love it. It's fast, presice, awesome resolution and takes pretty good pics! I own a Canon T3i so I didn't get this for the pics. I got it for the videos, shopping and,surfing net. I'd rather use this in my living room instead of my heavy Alien laptop. Resolution is beautiful, I love the quality of the overall kindle. The only flaw is the keyboard, I have a hard time typing accuratly. I guess ill get used to it. Besides I didn't buy it for writing a book.So far iove it! Battery is awesome. Since I'm a prime member it holds true to lasting 12 hours, and that's with watching movies, listen to music, surfing the web.If this would be your 1st tablet then get it!! It's awesome and easy to navigate !I will post an update in 2weeks. Oh, download time is fast as hec,  music transfer from pc is super fast! Not sure why people complain about downloading 1 movie at  time. Amazon has a boat load of movies to watch and download! Really? HowHow many movies can you watch at once??Since I fly across the country every month movie time is,awesome and reliable.Soon as I figure out how to add some pictures I took I will add them._________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________NEW UPDATE----CHANGE 5 STARS TO 3 BECASUE OF CUSTOMER SERVICE ISSUES....________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________AFTER RETURING MY 1ST TABLET BECASUE OF CONNECTIVITY ISSUES ON A REGUALR BASIS AMAZON REPLACE IT WITH A NEW ONE-SENT-AN EXHANGE. GREAT RIGHT!! WOOHO, GREAT INVESTMENT..UPDATE:JANURARY 16, 2014-PACIFIC TIME:AROUND 12:20AMI JUST GOT HOME AFTER A 10 HOUR FLIGHT. THIS WAS THE REAL TEST OF THE "NEW" REPLACEMENT. I WAS REGUARLY RENTING-BUYING MOVIES.BEFORE MY TRIP I DOWNLOADED "RUSH" AND A FREE PRIME MOVIE TO MY DEVICE-NOT CLOUD. SINCE I BOUGHT RUSH, IT WILL BE IN MY ON MY DEVICE.A FEW DIFFERENCE'S FROM 1ST-1- SPEED, IT SEEMED TO LAG, NOT AS SHARP FAST AS 1ST AND STILL GOING TO WIFI (NOT AS MUCH AS1ST ONE) SO I FIGURED I'D WAIT A BIT, SEE IF IT WOULD IMPROVE.WELL IT DID, ABOUT 60% BETTER, I WANTED 100%..SO I STUCK IT OUT. I JUST WANT THEM TO FIX IT-I TRAVEL TO MUCH AND I JUST WANT A RELIABLE PRODUCT---WATCHED RUSH AFTER DINNER-ONLY INTO 1 HOUR OR SO, EASTERN TIME, I TOOK A 20 MINUTE BREAK,WATCHED THE REST OF THE MOVIE. GREAT-AFTER THAT, TALKED TO THE GUY NEXT TO ME-BELIEVE ME, YOU WILL ALL GET THIS ONCE I FINISH THIS!!THE WANTED TO WATCH MY DOWNLOADED NO WAY BACK--WELL, I COULD OPEN THE MOVIE-I TRIED REBOOT 5 TIMES, LET IT REST, BUT SINCE I NEVER STARTED THESE MOVIES BUT FOR THE 1st TIME-IT SHOULD OF WENT SMOOTHLY...-FINALY FOR 2 HOURS NEITHER MOVIE WOULD DOWNLOAD!MAKE NOTE THIS WAS MY CONVERSATION TO THE AMAZON KINDLE SPECIALIST THE MINUTE I GOT HOME-QUOTE-THE MOVIE HAS TO RE-LICENSE ITSELF AFTER WATCHING MOVING..HUH? I DIDNT WATCH THE OTHER MOVIE AT ALL, SO THERE WAS NO REASON THE MOVIE SHOULD OF NEEDED THIS--AND THIS REPLY CAME BACK AFTER BEING ON HOLD FOR 1--15 MINUTES..ALL THESE EXCUSES!!!IM NOT HAPPY WITH THIS PRODUCT, I WANT MY $497++ BACK-NOP PER AMAZON-YOU CAN RETURN IT BUT I WONT GET ME MONEY BACKKK"""WHAT""" AMAZON REP ALSO STATED SOME OTHER RENEW LICENSE BULL.....VERY VERY UNAHPPY..I BET ITS IN THE MANNUAL NOW----OR SEND ME ANOTHER DARN ONE--IM TO0 TIRED NOW BUT I HAVE TO GET THIS OUT THERE.IF ANYONE IS EXPERIENCING ANY ISSUES PLEASE CALL AND TELL THEM!!!! IT DOES NO GOOD IF THEY ARE NOT WORKING PROBABLY AND THEY NEED TO KNOW..I HOPE THIS DOESNT HAPPEN TO ANYONE ELSE...STINKS.....ANY QUESTIONS I WILL REPLY, UPDATE TOMORROW..VERY VERY DISAPPOINTED AMAZON.I SPEND A LOT OF MONEY AND A PRIME MEMBER!!ONE MORE THING-WHAT'S REALLY THE DIFFERENCE IF THE SERVER IS ON PACIFIC, EAST, ICELAND, RUSSIA  ETC TIME?...JUST FELT LIKE I GOT THE BRUSH OFF... TIME--WHAT, PEOPLE WONT BUY THEM ON THE EAST COAST, OTHER COUNTRIES--______________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________LAST UPDATE--I JUST GOT AN EMAIL THEY WILL REFUND..ALL I WANT OS FOR IT TO WORK GREAT!! MOVIES, EMAIL, WIFI ...SHOP--ON AMAZON....  :-(
Reviews.Title: MAJOR TECHNICAL ISSURE-FOR ME ANYWAY

Reviews.Author: Jimmy C. Saunders "Papa Smurf"
Reviews.Content: Very pleased with it's performance. IT IS MY COMPUTER ON THE GO. Plus my entertainment at home and away. The panic button is the greatest thing since.certainly sliced bread. It and my hotspot GO wherever I go.
Reviews.Title: Tht HDX is the  ery dinktium!

Reviews.Author: J. Michelle Wynn "Church Girl"
Reviews.Content: Like it even better than the last kindle fire hd. The picture is better, the audio is better and a few more features. I HATE the case - they should have stuck with the last one - it's design was simple and easy to use. Love my kindle - hoping to find a better case.
Reviews.Title: Happy with the purchase

Reviews.Author: John N. Schëar "cxxi121"
Reviews.Content: December 13, 2013 Update:In conclusion, this is the finest tablet I have ever had or used.  It is faster than any of the others.  It has a display unmatched by others.  The resolution is so good that I do not have to put my cheating glasses on to read the screen.  If the screen output is too small a little expanded pinch enlarges it.  All together usage boils down to needs.  While 16GB is fine now, I can see where it would not take too long to need 32GB and while I do not now have a need to use the Kindle for a phone it could very well be handy at some later date.  The cameras are far better than several dedicated point and shoot cameras I use although it is not quite as good as the Coolpix 820 but that's an unfair comparison.  The Kindle's internet is so much faster than my desktop and laptop computers are.  In short it is a growing element on each of us here and we thoroughly enjoy using it and its applications with a positive outlook for tomorrow's adventures.Original comments:I have had this Kindle for only a few days and I have found it to be better than I imagined.  It is fast.  It has beautiful resolution and it is so good that I do not have to wear glasses to read the written words or graphics.  It is light and easy to hold.  Battery life is better than many of similar size.  The front and back cameras do a surer job and with its High Definition output I was astonished at the quality of the pictures.Right now I am simply getting to know the Kindle and it is a pleasure to keep its company.  It pairs quickly with Bluetooth and connects faster.  WiFi works well and has not kicked me off yet.  So far I have used about 36% of the 16Gb memory and could easily exceed that unless I pay closer attention.I readily admit to being a dummy now; however, with continued examination and exploration I can see no reason to change my initial rating other than to find more of the internal goodies.  Amazon and its partners did its customers a fine service and presented to them the top tablet.  There may be other tablets that rate higher by one service or another but each that exceeds the Kindle Fire HDX cost a whole lot more and does not have flexibility.In a few days I will update this to include any additional observations and thoughts.
Reviews.Title: TOP of the Line Tablet

Reviews.Author: kevo
Reviews.Content: I'm currently test driving the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" via Amazon's 30-day free trial.  Well, I'm definitely buying this because it has already exceeded expectations.  Set up was a breeze and I haven't had any issues web surfing and viewing media. The only problem so far has been how disruptive this technological masterpiece can be on time management - completely lost track of time while catching up on Season 3 of Downton Abbey in one day. Yep, Amazon Prime rocks!  This is an excellent product for the price!
Reviews.Title: So far so great..

Reviews.Author: Garrett
Reviews.Content: I like the new HDX 8.9, very light weight, clear and bright screen, good on battery, great ecosystem.  Coming from a ipad 2 gen, and nexus 7 i do miss little things like folders, widgets, multi tasking.  For what it does it delivers.  If your a amazon customer or Prime memeber and have the money to keep spending on music, books, videos in the amazon market place then this is something you would like.  I am disappointed about the app selection.  It pales to the like of Android and Apple, I hope more developers will start to build apps for these tabs but we will see.
Reviews.Title: Surprised by a lot it can do, disappointed a little.

Reviews.Author: USer
Reviews.Content: Excellent video quality and great to have on a plane with videos downloaded onto the device. There was a problem with getting the videos downloaded initially because it kept telling me that I had topped off my permitted 25 videos. The problem took 2 days to resolve. I think 2 days to resolve a problem is too long.
Reviews.Title: Excellent video quality

Reviews.Author: TC
Reviews.Content: Pretty great device, especially if you plan on reading or viewing movies for long periods of time. The screen resolution is outstanding, and the light weight of this tablet makes it a pleasure to hold for hours. The software interface is very quick, and I really do not miss the Google apps too much, although it would make the tablet much more functional if you could load them natively (I am aware that some of the Google apps can be sideloaded, but not all of them work appropriately). Many apps that people complain are not available through the Amazon store such as Firefox can easily be obtained by downloading the apk file directly from their website.I do wish there were more Prime movies and shows available for offline viewing, but hopefully the selection will expand soon. I also wish that the speakers were louder. I tried out a 7-inch HDX and the speakers were obviously louder, but that blue haze around the screen borders drove me crazy.
Reviews.Title: Very Satisfied With Purchase

Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: Excelent screen, thinner and lighter than others. It is a pleasure to take it anywhere. It is a good investment.
Reviews.Title: One of the best choices in the market

Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer "Jo"
Reviews.Content: WOW!!!  Love, Love my new 8.9, WiFi, 32GB, HDX.  I have never owned any type of tablet or ereader but with the help of 2 free guides downloaded to my PC, I had  WiFi turned on, my email & facebook set up, and  downloaded 8 books from my PC wish list within 1 hour.  I used it for reading for approx. 6 hours and 75% of battery life remains.  I used the black background w/ white text and liked that screen view.  No glitches during set up or reading. Thanks to Amazon for an amazing product.
Reviews.Title: Amazon hit a home run with the Kindle HDX

Reviews.Author: Kellett A. Goodwin
Reviews.Content: I think that this product (Kindle HDX 8.9 in) is the greatest thing that I've ever seen and I'm sure that I won't be without the latest version again. :) Tony Goodwin
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX

Reviews.Author: michellevmcfall "Michelle"
Reviews.Content: I chose the 5 star because since it was delivered I have had no problems with playing with it what is really great is that it's a sleeker smaller package what ever the games apps or books you got it came up on the cloud all I had to was touch it was downloaded the Camera works really great the front facing and the rear facing both it does what was promised.  Thank You Amazon
Reviews.Title: The Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 64gb Love It

Reviews.Author: Casey Reed
Reviews.Content: REALLY NICE !  Wow !  Not enough good things to say about the hardware. The confusion with any new platform has been well thought out by Amazon's tech team and owner who designed this tablet. Help is "MayDay" and live 24-7 Damn!What you can't find out that you need like subtitles on your movies (mpg4 - h264 ) files, is not a problem with VLC pro app to allow you to select available subtitles, and this app even goes on the internet to look for alternative subtitle files.Interfaces easily with PC and updates using WIFI quickly.Forget waiting when you turn it on: BANG !  It is on !  Quick as that it is on and you unlock the screen and there is the desktop or home with app icons ready to go on the internet, watch movies, listen to music, or see photos. Just a real high tech email checker for people who do not want to carry a laptop to stay in touch and be entertained.2.2Ghz Quadcore CPU makes this very high definition screen work beautifully !  Get enough memory now because there is NO card slot and you can NOT upgrade your memory later.Highly recommend as a PC builder and user.
Reviews.Title: Fast High Tech Tablet - 1st Quality on the market !

Reviews.Author: CSS
Reviews.Content: Got mine Saturday! Estimated date was Monday, but it came early. I like under promise and over deliver! I had the 8.9 fire HD. I loved it. I did not like the button placement on the Fire HD. So that was my main reason to get the HDX. But man was i wrong! There's a whole world of better reasons to upgrade from the HD!Get the Origami case! When you slide the HDX up, which is seamless, the camera comes on automatically. The new OS incorporated every suggestion I submitted and many I never even though of. All of which have been positives for me.In a world of ever increasing pour costumer service and even worse product releases this product sets the standard. I mean to say that nothing less than this should ever be acceptable. Mayday Mayday Mayday!!! A product that works with great customer service being Sold Here!
Reviews.Title: Mayday Mayday Mayday!!!

Reviews.Author: J. Peter Jorgensen
Reviews.Content: I just purchased the Fire HDX 8.9 16gb from Staples last night for $329 - WHAT A DEAL!  I love this tablet and upgraded to if from a Kindle Keyboard e-reader.  I thought long and hard about how I would use a tablet and have very few issues with going into Amazon's "walled garden".  The only reason for 4 stars is the lack of Google Drive (Google Docs).  If I can sideload this and it works, I will change to 5 stars.  I don't care about the other Google Apps because the Kindle offers good alternatives for e-mail and calendar.  I also do not use Google Books or Music.  I purchased the 16gb model because I get all of my video entertainment from Netflix via streaming.  I am heavy into Kindle Books and keep most of my books in the cloud (keeping about 50 on the device at one time).  I downloaded FBReader for ePub books and may sideload Nook Reader because my wife is a Nook HD+ owner and may need access to her Nook library.  I do know about Calibre e-book management software but complicated books such as 3000 page bibles with thousands of internal links do NOT convert well from ePub to Kindle.The hardware is OUTSTANDING, the price at $50 off was OUTSTANDING and the "Walled Garden" is more of a nuisance and not a deal breaker at all.  With the HDX being so popular, ANY of my "nuisances" with be overcome from the EXTREMELY large HDX user community.The Kindle HDX is what the Kindle HDX is - it's perfect.  It's not Android, it's not Apple BUT, I can make it do EVERYTHING I need it to do while looking better then ALL the other tablets and at a lower cost.
Reviews.Title: It is what it is...might even say perfect.

Reviews.Author: C. Bowman
Reviews.Content: Received my new Kindle Fire HDX 8.9, 32 GB today, and am totally pleased with the improvements I see so far from the older version of the 8.9.The first thing I noticed was how much lighter it seemed.  The picture quality is crisper and the sound is very impressive.I sold my older version of the 8.9 and have been using the 7" KF HD, but having the extra 1.9" is awesome. I use my Kindle everyday for shopping, e-reading, watching movies and  playing games and I know this new version will give me more enjoyment especially with the rear facing camera.Amazon has listened to customers of previous versions of the Kindle Fire and have given us a tablet that will be hard to beat.  Enjoy!!!
Reviews.Title: Wonderful!!!

Reviews.Author: Richard Spafford
Reviews.Content: I have only used the HDX for a few hours, but I've had every iteration of Kindle machines except the DX, and I think this is a stunningly good tablet. The weight of this tablet, as compared to the new iPad Air, for instance, is incredible. When you compare the two tablet's weight versus their volume, the HDX would be equal in weight to the one pound Air if it weighed 15.5 ounces. But it doesn't; it only weighs 13.1 oz!Thinness? The iPad air only has a two one hundredths of a millimeter advantage.The screen is just flat out brilliant. Watching movies and playing app games on this tablet is superior to everything else I own.The last thing I would add about the specs is that the more I use it, the better I like the size. I have a 10" Nexus 10, a 9.7" iPad, an 8.0" Samsung Note, and a few 7" tablets. For the combination of size, weight, and useful portability, I like the 8.9" of the HDX best.BUT, the most important thing about this new Kindle tablet is the increased usability. It just flies through everything and all the moves I want to make are much simpler, more intuitive than the 8.9 HD. My various Samsung devices have massive tricks and features, and the iPad on the new iOS is interesting, but neither works as easily as the new HDX. The only device that compares favorably to this in usability is the pure Android experience on the new Nexus 7... but it came with touch screen weirdness.Finally on the "pro" side, my 64 GB cost $20 less than the iPad Air's 16 GB tablet, and their 64 GB cost is $220 higher.Cons? In general, while greatly improved, the browsing experience cannot compare to Google.This is a first look. As I go, I'll add.
Reviews.Title: Incredible

Reviews.Author: Ken
Reviews.Content: I have had many issues with the HDX and WiFi since December. During a technical support call, their rep said that "The HDX has been experiencing issues with connecting to WiFi in high-traffic environments."  Amazing Amazon, exactly what has been happening.  They sent me another unit to test.  Same issue.  When I pressed them to fix the issue (because I do not want to send it back), they said they were a "customer centric company".  I asked if they had looked at their own webpage and the 40+ pages of customer comments on the WiFi issue, the customer service rep would not validate.  But yet she said that they are a company that focused on reading and listening to their customers' comments and feedback.  Contradictory.  When I asked for an response, she said she would investigate and respond.  Here is their response ..."I'm sorry, Amazon.com does not comment about rumors or speculative news reports. We haven't announced any plans to update the wireless capabilities on the kindle devices as there is not a known issue at this time. Furthermore, we cannot speculate or disclose information about what another customer may be facing. If you continue to experience wireless issues in high traffic areas, please contact our kindle specialists at 1-877-453-4512. I'm sorry I can't provide any additional information. We hope to see you  again soon. "Sounds like someone from public relations or legal crafted this.  Always been a big fan of Amazon. Loved the Kindle. Want to keep it. Ordered many things from Amazon. But can't use it outside of my home (not in a 'high traffic environment').Now? Returning both kindles. Prime membership ending. No more orders to Amazon.Note to Amazon, if you wish to "Build Earth's Most Customer-Centric Company" ... then maybe your words have to connect to actions.  Transparency.
Reviews.Title: Transparency and Honesty from Amazon

Reviews.Author: Gina
Reviews.Content: The Pros of this proucts were the size, weight, and feel. The 8.9" was PERFECT for me. Not too big, but bigger than the "mini" tablets. The weight was super light and easy to hold, and the feel of it was great. The back was sort of rubberized which was nice. The display was beautiful and the sound.The Cons however, were too much to get over to consider keeping it. The product does not allow for much customization as far as wallpaper, screen saver, icons, etc. I couldn't put things where I wanted them. I also was not happy with the operating system itself. It was almost too user friendly. The system ran quickly, but just not "up to par" with other current systems out there. I have a Samsung Galxy S4 phone, and couldn't stop comparing the two. My biggest complaint though, is that is does not allow many of the most popular "normal" apps available. I was aware before purchasing that they did not have the vast amount of apps as on Google Play or the Apple store. However, I couldn't believe that I couldn't even download Dropbox! One of the main reasons for getting a tablet was for me to put work files on it when I travel. I was going to use Dropbox for this. I couldn't do it! They also have blocked most Google branded apps. So it did not sync well with my Google accounts. They had a gmail app, but it wasn't up to date with the newest style so things would look different from my phone to my tablet.Overall, just very frustrated with the Operating system setup, look, and the lack of apps. Also annoying that you have to pay extra to REMOVE the ads! I had to return it. I ended up buying the brand new Samsung Tab Pro and LOVE it. The size is a tad smaller and weighs a BIT more, but It is much more "modern" and works so much better! The Tab Pro was also cheaper and allows me to add a memory card if I ever need it!
Reviews.Title: Very unhappy!

Reviews.Author: spuds366
Reviews.Content: My husband has his I-pad and I would put my Kindle against it any day! He has been put through the rigor after calling customer service and was amazed at the mayday option on my HDX. To bad so sad for him, it's mine all mine and he knows to keep his I-pad and stop hating LOL
Reviews.Title: Love My Kindle Fire HDX

Reviews.Author: MickeyJoe
Reviews.Content: Amazon Prime + Amazon Fire TV + Kindle Fire HDX = :-OI have the very first 7" Kindle Fire from 2011, and it still works perfectly.  I got the Verso Marrakesh Genuine Leather Cover for that, and love it so much.  It has worn around the Kindle and looks like a well worn vintage book.But with the new Amazon Fire TV, and loving it, I decided to go all out an upgrade to the larger 8.9" HDX, and so glad I did.  The interaction between the two is awesome.  I love the screen swapping and basically using the Kindle as a remote.  The "second screen" is awesome when watching movies and tv.  Since Amazon owns IMDB, it literally pops up information on each actor as they appear, as well as various info in all scenes.  Like a non-intrusive commentary.  No more "who is that actor" as you just look at your HDX and there it is.Since 2011, I have collected thousands of free apps via Amazon's app store.  They give at least one app away free every day, so the value of the apps I have make it well worth the investment to get the largest storage available of 64GB.  But I love being able to listen to my 51,000 songs stored on my Amazon Cloud and listen on the Cloud player taking no device space at all.All apps and functions are blazing fast and quite a jump from my 2011 Kindle Fire.  I also have Apple's iPad, iPhone etc.  But the HDX is all about the Amazon experience for me.  I'm quite embedded with products and services by Amazon, and you cannot beat their customer service.  Which I have to also say that the HDX customer service feature called MayDay is quite amazing.  When setting it up, I had a question, and you click MayDay and an actual person appears on your screen.  They can see your screen and help you with anything, or show you features right in front of you.  They talk you through it, or you watch how they do it.  All while seeing who you are talking to in a video box in the corner.  They don't see you, but it would be an interesting option.I have the HDX on all day.  Either on stand-by or full use, I get a full day of use at home or travel.  I would say at least 10-12 hours of use.  I just charge when I go to bed.  I feel like I use the Kindles more than my iThings, but both serve different needs.  However go all out and go for it.  A great investment.  Sure there will be something new around the corner, but you know that this is still going to be working years down the road.  Quality product and customer service.  Priceless.
Reviews.Title: Jump into Amazon's ecosystem full-force with HDX!

Reviews.Author: VicChik
Reviews.Content: I had been wanting to try the new Kindle Fire HDX and finally I did. WOW.  I also recently bought a new laptop.  My laptop sits.  I carry my Kindle everywhere I go.  It's so light--like carrying a small book but the things this little package can do.  The graphics is excellent. Its very easy to use.  But perhaps most of all, the customer service rep at the touch of a button is nothing short of genius. I just used it and am so impressed.  Super fast response and fixed my problem right a way with a personal phone call.  It's unheard of.  Today when personal customer service is nearly a thing of the past, Amazon sets yet a new standard.  Hats off and many many kudos to Amazon for a great product and THE BEST customer service anywhere.  Without question, I would recommend this product  . If you want to give someone something special, definitely consider the Kindle Fire HDX.  They will love you for it.  I wish I had bought my Kindle Fire first and not the laptop.
Reviews.Title: Absolutely brilliant!

Reviews.Author: LaWanda J. Taylor
Reviews.Content: I like my previous Kindle better for screen quality - there is too much glare on the screen to make it easy for reading.  I am sure I will like it for the other functions it offers but since I am an avid reader, I will be using my other Kindle more.
Reviews.Title: I find display screen lacking

Reviews.Author: Mark m
Reviews.Content: Very happy with the fire hdx. it just needs a sim card slot. an ability to plug in a card reader would be nice
Reviews.Title: missing one thing

Reviews.Author: Tilaran Rita "Rita"
Reviews.Content: I did all the research and it was everything I wanted it to be.  I need to take advantage of the online support because I haven't figured out how to take advantage of all it's abilities.  And I don't know how to organize my book collections yet.  It's totally different from the system I was used to in my old Kindle, which still works beautifully, it's just a dinosaur.  It takes a while to get used to the gorgeous display after my black and white.  Love my Kindle.
Reviews.Title: Everything it was expected to be.

Reviews.Author: A. R. St Jean "ARS"
Reviews.Content: This is a great product. It replaces my first generation fire. So far I have found the performance to be perfect, great visual characteristics and great sound from such tiny speakers. Highly recommend.
Reviews.Title: Dynamite

Reviews.Author: ankitkat
Reviews.Content: Positive -Really Good Display.  Excellent for Reading Books, Magazines and PDF files . Very Light and thin. Awesome  Battery life and quick charging put this device ahead of iPad. I bought it because of these positive points only.Negative -Crashes very often while reading TIMES or NAT. GEO. magazines ,specially running videos or reading from in build pop up functionality of magazines. Very poor web browser compare to iPad Safari or Android  Phone Browser.  No GOOGLE apps .Yes you read it write - You cannot find Google Apps in Amazon App store.In Sort, If you are fan of Amazon content , just go for it. If you are looking for android tablet , please search fro Samsung Galaxy Tab. :)
Reviews.Title: Four Star - Excellent for Reading , Poor for Tableting

Reviews.Author: Gregg C. Michael
Reviews.Content: I have waited a long time for a product to please me and it is fantastic. Plus I have never found something so user friendly.
Reviews.Title: Love this damn thing!

Reviews.Author: J. S.
Reviews.Content: There is a problem with the camera when in the case (with camera hole - purchased on Amazon), the forward facing camera is used a big logo appears in the view finder that states 'slide camera up to take picture'.  Now why in the world should I have to take the camera out of the case to take a picture?  This type of issue requires a software upgrade or fix.  The picture still takes, but it make is impossible to focus in on something.  I have seen on blogs where others have this problem also, and I know someone who has a different 3rd party case - purchased on Amazon with the same problem.  Come on Amazon - you have a great product here - now come up with a great and easy solution to fix this, or my rating may go down - I'd like to make it 5 stars.  Thank you.
Reviews.Title: Love the new Kindle - but...

Reviews.Author: Beth A. Sokol
Reviews.Content: Finally, I got this for Christmas.  Absolutely love it so far.  Beautiful screen color and clarity.  Just the right size.  Still figuring some things out yet.  Gaming on the HDX is impressive.
Reviews.Title: Merry Christmas to Me...

Reviews.Author: alanm32
Reviews.Content: I will make this short, to the point and focus on what I feel really matters.  Starting with the display, It is as advertised sharp with  great color and contrast. Next the kindle is fast, it has a Quad-core 2.2 GHz Krait 400 which in conjunction with a fast gpu (Adreno 330)  provides outstanding performance whether your playing games or general computing.  To sum it all up, its very light very fast great display and very good battery life.  Prior to the most recent update it would occasionally reboot by itself.  Since then  I have had  and no operating issues AT ALL.  I have owned it since 11/13.  Great Purchase.
Reviews.Title: Great Choice

Reviews.Author: kd "Kathezplc"
Reviews.Content: I Have Enjoyed each day I have had this New 8.9 HDX. I have the smaller 2012 7" HD from last year, which I was thrilled with.However I had wished I had the larger screen. My Family surprised me this year with The New HDX 8.9.I Love the larger screen of course, the clarity and Beauty of this screen is Amazing. Sound is also improved. As far as how quickly my New Kindle works it moves its faster than my last years model. I do have occasional issues with my Wifi and not a Kindle issue. We know this because in another home works great with no issues.  So I have to go into settings and turn off my wifi for a second and turn it back on, ususally works fine.  Some of you who blamed your kindle might look at your Wi Fi connection. Does this bother me No....usually takes care of its self quickly.This time around I don't have the little annoying advertisements, that was a sweet surprise.Have not had to use the help button. It is wonderful to know that I have that option.  There are changes, some of your Apps are in your cloud & take a few minutes to download to your new Kindle. Frankly I thought this was nothing to get excited about. Though some found it insulting. I found that some Apps can stay in the cloud. Music, books, games, etc....I can get them anytime its not an issue.This Kindle is So Light, and thin its like air.  It also takes Beautiful front and back pictures, & Movies.  Also if you are like me you will need a Nice case to keep you New Kindle protected. Just read the reviews or the general feel of them. I chose one made by Amazon for the Kindle. I works very well. To each her or his own likes for that.So now I have read a lot of reviews, many people find issues with everything.  I am not techy enough to rate it item to item.I can tell you the HDX is a Beautiful improvement from last years Kindle HD. I have not compared it item by item. I can say its thinner, Lighter, Screen is just Stunning.......and that was comparing it to family memebers I Pad, and that is what they said as well.So I would say do your homework (as someone said) then follow your way to the New Kindle HDX 8.9Really don't think you will be disappointed. I certainly am not. Our family bought two at the same time. Although these gifts are at different homes, we keep in touch comparing things. Both of us can not say enough about our new Kindles.Great Job Amazon, Another Winner!  Enjoy
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9"

Reviews.Author: Alan
Reviews.Content: I really like the 8.9 HDX. The build quality is excellent,  the OS enhancements are well thought out, and the processor is fast. And of course the screen resolution is incomparable. This table meets my needs and I think Amazon has done themselves proud.
Reviews.Title: I love this device.

Reviews.Author: richard
Reviews.Content: I give this unit a 4 because the opportunity was there for kindle to have had it built with a sd-slot card capability,, they choose not to, this would have made it perfect.  rick, in Cincinnati
Reviews.Title: the last step could have been taken

Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: Just received my new Fire HDX 8.9" (about an hour ago) and am still exploring it, but I have made one discovery that I can't wait to share.Collections are back!!The ability to organize my books into collections has been the thing I have missed most since going from Kindle Touch to fire.  Even my iPad, which is slowly losing it's mind but the Kindle App still works, doesn't let me organize my books into collections, but my new Ire HDX does.I actually bought this kindle to use as a tablet since my old iPad has been going senile and losing things.  I figured since the Kindle app still worked, I would simply use it as an eReader with a larger screen.  It's still good for that and I may give it to my granddaughter, but I have nearly a thousand books and finding a particular one can take ten minutes.No more long searches.  Collections are back.
Reviews.Title: I Can Organize My Books Again!!

Reviews.Author: Walter F. Baranowski Jr.
Reviews.Content: It is so easy to read and all the great app.,  As a 79 year old I found easy and you always have help
Reviews.Title: My new Christmas present

Reviews.Author: Dawn R
Reviews.Content: I LOVE THIS KINDLE. I HAVE ONLY USED FOR EMAILS AND READING BUT I JUST LOVE IT. I DIDN'T RECEIVE MY SPECIAL OFFERS SO I AM NOT SURE WHAT THEY ARE OR WERE. IF YOU ARE ON THE FENCE ABOUT GETTING A KINDLE GO FOR THE BIGGER SCREEN AND HDX DISPLAY-GLAD I PICKED THIS TABLET OVER ANOTHER BRAND.
Reviews.Title: KINDLE FIRE HDX 8.9

Reviews.Author: Good Guy
Reviews.Content: I researched tablets heavily and eventually decided on the Kindle HDX. All features that I saw in most tablets work seamlessly and quickly. The immediate definitions while reading is a big plus. The only downfall, which may or may not be unique to the Kindle, is it had very poor connectivity to my Wi-Fi. I had to buy a stronger router, but that fixed the problem.I would recommend this.
Reviews.Title: Fabulous tablet

Reviews.Author: Diana Fournier
Reviews.Content: This is our sixth kindle fire in the household and I'm in love! I love the larger screen, dual cameras, best present from my hubby I've gotten in awhile! I didn't originally think I needed am upgrade from the original fire hd but I'm glad he did!
Reviews.Title: wonderful again Amazon!

Reviews.Author: fifthzepin
Reviews.Content: I've had a Kindel Fire for almost 3 years. I have been considering a purchase of a tablet or another Kindle. I finally decided to make the jump and purchase the new Kindle Fire HDX with the large screen. I am so pleased, what a wonderful thing.....I loved my old "Fire" but this 8.9 display is just perfect. I also purchased the case at the same time and didn't know if I'd like it but the origami case is great, glad I took a chance and choose it.I was on my old "Fire" almost everyday, this beautiful new HDX 8.9 took up where the old left off and soars higher.Go ahead, jump, you will not be disappointed.
Reviews.Title: What's not to LOVE

Reviews.Author: Rafael Olivo
Reviews.Content: The images are crisp and beautiful, no pixel distortion even in shadowed areas of images. Movies run smoothly and internal speakers have reasonable fidelity. Book and magazine reading offers excellent features. Allows to highlight sections, take notes, look up definitions automatically in dictionaries and Wikipedia, connects you on-line with a word or phrase selected. Mayday button was used once for help locating a file and the response was immediate and very helpful. Battery duration even with constant usage is dependable.
Reviews.Title: highly recommended

Reviews.Author: lyn
Reviews.Content: I bought the 32 gb  8.9 HDX . I have only used it about a week.  So far I am impressed with the speed of it.  The screen is awesome.  I am so happy I checked out all the other tablets for months and finally decided on this one!  I have downloaded free movies from prime and watched them recently.  Borrowed a book on it from my local library and bought a couple books on Amazon.  Got some games on the app store and the graphics are excellent.  So far I really like everything about this tablet.  However the Mayday option does not work on mine, it takes me to a help page with a picture of a sad dog that says sorry this link is no longer here.  Anyone know how to get this function to work?  I'm not sure why it doesn't,  but I'm still going to give five stars because I'm really enjoying this.  This is my favorite tablet I've had so far.
Reviews.Title: my Mayday doesn't work,  but i really like everything ether about this tablet!

Reviews.Author: DesertFey "DesertFey"
Reviews.Content: I am on hour TWO with a THIRD person trying to get items from my 'yourMediaLibrary' up to the Amazon Cloud so I can then get them to my new Kindle.  Really loving the Kindle, but if Amazon can't get stuff to the Cloud that I have purchased over the years, I'm going to return it and go with another tablet.  I specifically bought the Kindle to start using their highly hyped Cloud availability.  If I want to sit around and transfer Amazon purchased items to my Kindle from my computer, I think I'll do it with another tablet.  Still sitting here waiting for help...... Cannot believe that after the first Mayday call (pretty cool feature) that the second person went off and then disconnected.  NOT happy with the help (all very nice and sorry about everything) but lets get this Kindle and YourMediaLibrary connected.  Two and one-half hours.............not how I wanted to spend New Year's Day on my Kindle.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Help - Now at hour two

Reviews.Author: Nancy Gilliam
Reviews.Content: This is our 5th kindle.  All have done what they were designed to do and do it well.  We use Amazon a lot and this works for us.  It is great to not have to purchase our books, movies & apps again. We just downloaded them to our new Kindle.  I will not repeat to much all the good things others have said.  Now I have seen a common complaint about goggle apps, not being able to load. This is a none issue.  It can be done. Just check the internet.  I do it all the time.  I had to do a factory reset when I was trying to down load 2 movies, 10 books, 3 songs and about 15 apps all at the same time..  My books would not stay open. I pushed the Mayday button & was able to get straightened out.  It was great.All the tablets are great.  This one is one of the best out there.
Reviews.Title: Another great Kindle

Reviews.Author: Paulette J. Perez
Reviews.Content: I am still learning it but I really love having my new Kindle. It is really great and I will continue checking out all it's really great things.
Reviews.Title: Love it !

Reviews.Author: Tracy
Reviews.Content: Can't wait for new apps to come but love what I have!! Video and audio quality are out of this world
Reviews.Title: Love it!!

Reviews.Author: Sonya Mosley
Reviews.Content: best thing I ever bought. Very good product I would buy again. I haven't had a problem with it yet. I love how music plays on it, download speed is fast. taking pictures  is quick and easy.I love my kindle
Reviews.Title: I love my kindle

Reviews.Author: tracy
Reviews.Content: Really enjoyed the kindle fire, very user friendly.... Initiative, great display and fun to use. Definitely going to be buying one... Love how my books sync with each device.
Reviews.Title: Loved the kindle fire hdx!

Reviews.Author: Kris
Reviews.Content: Got the free trial offer it was really hard to give it up but Xmas was around the corner. This is by far is the best Kindle ever.
Reviews.Title: GOT EVEN BETTER

Reviews.Author: Susan L. Kaul
Reviews.Content: I love this Kindle fire I had the original Kindle fire before the screens started getting so fancy but now the HDX is unbelievable it is so fast I have never had a computer online more fast than this thing it also has the crystal clarity of  beauty on every page. I love it ! also picture taking is unbelievable it's the best I I just can't believe how many improvements have been done to it
Reviews.Title: Top of the line

Reviews.Author: Anne Mummert
Reviews.Content: I'm not a gadget girl so I'm slowly finding my way around my new Kindle. Was able to take and email a photo yesterday.Only critical thing I've found thus far is not being able to personalize your screen. Don't particularly like the mechanical images selected. Ok. I'm a girl and NOT mechanical. How about some beautiful beaches, mountains, flowers, dogs or kittens?!
Reviews.Title: Love my new tablet

Reviews.Author: Sergio Basilides Pascual "Basilides"
Reviews.Content: First time entering the world of Tablets. I advise a lot, and all they said Sansung and Mac, I decided to go for Amazon, and I was not wrong at all, fast, friendly and easy to operate. I gave it to my wife, I want to have one for me. My compliments.
Reviews.Title: DO NOT HESITATE, BUY IT

Reviews.Author: Gandalfe
Reviews.Content: Wow, okay I'm biased, but wow. I use this device at least two hours a day on my bus commute and people now rely on me for certain kinds of research. With the 4G this is blazingly fast. The video is stunning and the speakers surprisingly good considering the small form factor. I also really appreciate that the battery last longer, the device is lighter than my HD, and the rear-mounted camera is very nice.
Reviews.Title: And the winning tablet is ...

Reviews.Author: Sweets Ervin
Reviews.Content: I absolutely  love  this Kindle, Mayday  is  always  so helpful, I currently  own  the Kindle Hd  and 1st  generation.  If  this  one  would  have  came  out  first,  would  not  have brought  the  other two.  This kindle  is  thinner  than the iPad 2, a little  smaller  but  side  by  side,  you  really  can't  tell  the  difference. If  you  own 2  Kindles  and  read a  lot,  once  you  put  one  down and  pick  up  the  other  one,  it  takes  you  to  that  location.  This  wasn't  something  mentioned  on  the  website  but  an  added  bonus,  just  wanted  to  share.
Reviews.Title: Kindle 8.9 HDX

Reviews.Author: John J. Beeler "JB"
Reviews.Content: This year I switched from my Nook HD to the new Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 and love it.  It is super easy to use and super fast.  I even used the Mayday button on my first day and had my question answered immediately, by a friendly tech.  He was very helpful.  So glad I made the switch.  I even used Amazon Prime many times and amazed how fast I receive my purchases.  I will recommend the Fire HDX 8.9 to all my friends!
Reviews.Title: Using and loving it!!

Reviews.Author: Barbie Mitchell
Reviews.Content: This was everything I hoped for. My birthday and Christmas gift in one.This is my third Kindle. We have become a kindle family.
Reviews.Title: Absolutely love it!

Reviews.Author: Eleanor Hufnagel
Reviews.Content: I originally chose the kindle fire HDX because of their claim of being lighter and better screen resolution  It's delivers in that respect but  fails in so many others.  WiFi is sketchy.  Apps (only a fraction of available apps compared to apple or android market) don't load and I've spent hours watching a spinning circle.. I have  high end router and although it says my connection is "excellent", nothing is smooth.I've had to boot from factory settings several times and the help screen unfortunately is staffed with folks, that are nice but not very knowledgeable.  I keep getting kicked up to the next tech over and over with nothing solved.  I regret this purchase.
Reviews.Title: Big disappointment

Reviews.Author: Missus  B
Reviews.Content: I'm pretty sure that it doesn't get any better than this. This kindle does everything I want and a whole lot I probably haven't discovered yet. The picture is clear as a bell and it's lighter than my older 8.9" HD. It has easy to use functions and apps and if I get hopelessly confused I have Mayday, or chat or the web for help. I use it every day for just about everything but phone calls and texts. My husband is also ecstatic that I bought this one, although I have to say he has an ulterior motive; I gave him my old one! I think that secretly I want to be a "tech junky" and this lets me feel like I am. I would very much recommend this to anyone in the market for a tablet that isn't looking to use it as a laptop substitute using large software packages. It has the best of all (that it was designed for) and I'm happy as can be with it. I can't speak to the inner specifications as I know little about that stuff, I only know that I am totally satisfied with it and believe that it was worth every penny I paid for it.
Reviews.Title: I love this kindle!!

Reviews.Author: SingleMommy
Reviews.Content: My wife got me the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" for Christmas.  It is my first tablet.  I really like the way it works, its' speed and the quality of the product.  I am not an Apple fan.  My wife has an iPad and I like mine much better.  Apps are great.  I especially like the Bloomberg free app.
Reviews.Title: Beats iPad hands down!!!

Reviews.Author: SF Reader
Reviews.Content: I bought this after reading great reviews about this. Here are my key issues with it:Cons:a) HDMI connection not available - you cannot connect this kindle via an hdmi cable to a TV for instance. To mirror the screen you have to use Miracast. The equipment for that costs another $50 and hasn't recd. good reviews. Perhaps I should have read the reviews more carefully? I just assumed that this option would be available.b) Silk browser - very unstable. It appears to be a known issue. I now use Mozilla (was unable to download the Dolphin Browser)c) Slingbox not supported - I am unable to see my TV remotely as Slingbox doesn't support it.Pros:a) Mayday - great feature. Responsive teamb) 4G  connection seemed pretty fast - however if you run into issues and call your phone company they don't know how to troubleshoot stuff as they dont' have much of a database/knowlege regarding the new kindle yet.
Reviews.Title: Underwhelmed - certain key features missing

Reviews.Author: Judi Green
Reviews.Content: I have had to shut it down way to many times just to get it to work, I only had to do that with my other Kindle fire once. This froze on me and I had to get on my computer to get help well what if I didn't have a computer where would I be. I'm not to happy with it.
Reviews.Title: To many problems with it

Reviews.Author: durward Smith
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HDX is designed to promote sales of other merchandize for Amazon.  It is limited in its use, and not at all what I expected.  I wanted a small device where I could archive Word documents and Power Point files.  I did not want to buy books or movies, or be inundated with adds.  I wish I would have bought an Apple or Windows device!
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX

Reviews.Author: Aquaman
Reviews.Content: Just upgraded my Kindle Fire for the new 8.9" HDX. Totally worth the money, especially since Amazon offered to upgrade with installment payments for the new model. I like the larger screen and the camera was a great addition. I use it all the time, I recommend joining Amazon Prime too. Tons of movies and TV shows. I also am an Audible book club member. Listening to books on the train is great. I hardly get a chance to read anymore so Audible is terrific. All this entertainment in such a compact, portable device is amazing. I take it everywhere. Thanks Amazon!
Reviews.Title: Loving my Kindle Fire HDX upgrade, thanks Amazon!

Reviews.Author: Boo Radley
Reviews.Content: Bought this to replace my iPad – had high hopes for it, think it has some great features, and really wanted to give my money to Amazon rather than Apple.  I think it’s a great device for a first-time tablet owner, but ultimately I think it falls short as an IPad replacement.I have first generation iPad that has become virtually unusable. There is nothing physically wrong with it – it just crashes continually because its memory can’t keep up with “advances” in operating system and apps since I bought it three years ago.  This problem plagues earlier generation iPad’s and Apple’s response is “EOL” – the device is end-of-life and they won’t support it; buy a new one if you want one that works. I think Apple meant “SOL.”Not enamored with this attitude, I looked for an alternative and thought I had found one in the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9. Great specs, beautiful display, most of the apps I wanted  (I thought) in the Amazon app store.  And cheaper (although it is a little smaller). And I think Amazon’s a great company so I ordered one.The display is beautiful, and it was a huge pleasure to watch video on the device. I like my viewing on a big screen and never watch much on a tablet, but I had a bunch of waiting-around time the weekend I got the Fire HDX and binge watched some shows from Amazon Prime (Luther, Sherlock, Alpha House). Download was easy, video was terrific, and though I originally thought it was just a gimmick, I LOVE the X-Ray feature on the Fire HDX. Sound is good, too, although I mostly used headphones.I also love the cursor control when typing text on the Fire. A slider appears under the text box that lets you precisely place the cursor for editing, much easier to use than Apple’s.The device was snappy, but not eye-wateringly fast, as I expected upgrading from the original iPad.I don’t use a ton of apps, and before I bought the Fire I checked that a couple I use regularly on the IPad were available for the Fire in the Amazon App store. But being available doesn’t mean they’re the same. For example, on the iPad I have the paid version of Words With Friends, but the only one available for the Fire is the ad-based version, which pops up an ad after every move. It also sometimes  will not let me escape from the ad without exiting the app.  Very annoying, and I would be willing to pay a couple bucks for the upgrade, but it’s not available. I also use Zite (an online magazine) quite a bit – again, the Kindle version looks different (not a big deal) but also frequently hung up when I tried to play video from within the app.I also surprised to find the lack of customization available on the Kindle. Really, I can’t put my kids’ picture on the home screen or lock screen? I can’t put shortcuts to web pages on the home screen? Well, maybe I can do that, but if so, I have no idea how, which brings me to another point of frustration – finding information on how to do things on this device.As far as I can tell, all Kindle devices come under the same user forum on Amazon. Whether you’ve got an original Kindle, an HDX, or any of the e-reader and Fire devices in between, all the discussions are in one big lump. Makes for a lot of wading through irrelevant material to find what you need. For example, I was trying to figure out how to put a bookmark to a website on my home screen, so I could just tap that icon and go straight to that webpage, rather than firing up the Silk browser and then navigating to the website. Can I do it? I don’t know. I found instructions on how to do this, but they were for an earlier Fire tablet (or browser version?) and the instructions didn’t track to what I was seeing on the HDX. Eventually, I gave up. I also gave up on finding a comprehensive user manual for the device – the only one I could find on Amazon was a .pdf of the quickstart guide, and the “User guide” on the device is almost as bare bones. Yes, I could have tried the Mayday feature but I really don’t want to fire up an A/V connection and talk to someone every time I have a question about the device.Ultimately, the tablet didn’t do – or didn’t do as well – some of the things I was used to doing on my IPad, and the time I was investing in figuring all that out just wasn’t worth the price difference between the HDX and the iPad. So, hating myself, I reluctantly bought an iPad Air and am returning the HDX.If this were my first, tablet, I think I would be very happy with it. In fact, we bought a Fire HDX 7 for my 11-year-old and she loves it. But for me, it was not an adequate replacement for my iPad.
Reviews.Title: Reluctantly Returning this Very Good Tablet

Reviews.Author: ecojackie "ecojackie"
Reviews.Content: I bought this device for my wife who was in the market for a computer. The advances of the HDX give it nearly all the functionality she needs to research, surf, watch media, and write. The form is outstanding, it is light, and faster than any other device we own. Bravo Amazon!
Reviews.Title: The best thing since sliced bread!

Reviews.Author: blue boy
Reviews.Content: This is my first tablet and i'm still learning how to use it. It is very lightweight. The screen is a good size and the color is amazing. I had to use mayday twice and the second time i could not hear the mayday lady and my sound was on but she does come on fairly quickly. I will update later when I learn more. My grandaughter is helping me. Got the 32 gig. don't know if i will need it but I got the tablet with a special on paying it off in installments so i went for  the 32 instead of the 16. Love taking pictures and sending them to FB. The sound is very good also. I did buy a cover for it which makes it quite a bit heavier but i think you would need one to protect it.
Reviews.Title: kindle hdx8.9

Reviews.Author: L. Guzzo
Reviews.Content: Resolution is fantastic.  Started using the front camera.  Takes excellent pictures but a little unweldy to hold for a long period of time.  Connects with internet very quickly.  Had an opportunity to use the Mayday feature to ask a question.  Very fast response and the person handling the question did so quickly and to the point.
Reviews.Title: Good Choice

Reviews.Author: lojo
Reviews.Content: Loving the Kindle,  would recommend it to everyone!The only negative would be that I cannot pair it with my bluetooth headset but if that's the only thing it's still perfect.
Reviews.Title: Love it!!!

Reviews.Author: Doris
Reviews.Content: The new Kindle is so much lighter  and is a lot faster. I thought it would be larger than the one I had,but I had a fire 8.9.  I like the new features on the new one. This is my 3rd kindle and I am on it eachday for several hours.
Reviews.Title: Kindle 8.9

Reviews.Author: Jbiel "Traveler"
Reviews.Content: I use this Kindle every day. Great for reading books getting the news. I think the pictures show up better  on this screen than on an iPad. Would have given it 4 stars if it could play a greater range of video types. More importantly there are a number of Android apps that I would like to use that will not run on the Kindle. For instance LightTrac. I am a photographer this is an app that landscape photographers use all the time. It does not play on a kindle.
Reviews.Title: good but could be better

Reviews.Author: Diana P. Lewis
Reviews.Content: I just love this Kindle!! It is incredibly light,weight, and the graphics and color are amazing!! Takes great pictures, and very easy to use..Great promotional sale, also...if you are in the market for a replacement tablet, not just a book reader, definitely put Kindle at the top of your list!
Reviews.Title: Kindle HDX

Reviews.Author: Beverly Mallow
Reviews.Content: I used this a few times but my sister loves it as she is a great reader so I just have to go with what I'm told.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX

Reviews.Author: drcast
Reviews.Content: I loved my kindle fire and now my daughter is enjoying it  since I upgraded to the HDX 8.9. I am still learning all the cool ways to use it but the big reason I purchased it was to have a tablet linked to kindle and Amazon that has bigger screen. I can create documents with the free download and so much more, like magazines which are larger and color is great. Also the camera with reverse picture taking is a plus. So far I really like it.
Reviews.Title: i had the kindle fire for two years

Reviews.Author: james clark
Reviews.Content: My wife Love's it! This is much faster than expected. Very easy to use, the mayday button is great. Awsome print capability.
Reviews.Title: great tablet

Reviews.Author: Irina
Reviews.Content: very clear and sharp image, super-light, nice to hold! just the right size to combine reading and movie watching functions.highly recommend!!! worth every dollar!If only there were more accessories...
Reviews.Title: fantastic device

Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "arcon"
Reviews.Content: I'd recommend the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 without reservation. It works and performs exactly as described by Amazon. Worth it. So, if you are hesitating, don't. Just buy it. But, if you must read in sunlight, pick up the Kindle that is best for reading outdoors, at the beach, in the sun; I did. The convenience of having your library on the go under any lighting condition makes it ll worthwhile.
Reviews.Title: Great Product

Reviews.Author: David Boege
Reviews.Content: Picture quality is unbelievable and syncing with all the amazon features (prime, kindle library, etc.) is seamless...  Incredible power and quality- has the possibility to be life transforming, if you are willing...
Reviews.Title: Awesome Tablet
