Reviews.Author: Mel
Reviews.Content: There really is nothing intrusive with the "special offers", other than seeing when when you first "wake" the tablet. So much memory, and what a crytal clear picture and sound. I have yet to find anything that I dont love about this.
Reviews.Title: I LOVE MY KINDLE FIRE HDX!

Reviews.Author: D. Bates
Reviews.Content: I had the previous model Kindle and loved it. But I always find myself saying "I wish I had my camera" well, since I go nowhere without my Kindle I no longer have to say that. LOVE IT LOVE IT LOVE IT!! I only wish the 7" came with the camera on both sides like the 8.9 does. Made that mistake and had to exchange it. I like the 8.9" but it does not fit as well in my purse.
Reviews.Title: Love it!!!

Reviews.Author: atmtore
Reviews.Content: The video viewing is absolutly unbelievable.  I have never seen an HD screen look as great this device does.I am having trouble trying to read books, it is just a matter of finding the user manual online.
Reviews.Title: Incredible

Reviews.Author: J. Terrell "Avid TV Watcher"
Reviews.Content: This is my best purchase ever!  It has such beautiful color and so many other terrific features. I LOVE IT!
Reviews.Title: This is sooooo cool, I have been wanting this kindle since it came out!

Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I wish I could buy one for each of our grandkids! These are the best! I've always loves to read but when we go somewhere it's so awkward to take a bunch of books in the car. And as you get older it's so wonderful to be able to make the print larger. Also to be able to check email on the same device is just the best!
Reviews.Title: I love it! I had a 7" which my husband uses now!

Reviews.Author: Margaret
Reviews.Content: I was a proud, and very addicted owner of the original Kindle Fire which I purchased on it's release.  Although I was tempted to buy the first 8.9 HD, I'm glad I waited for this device... it's everything I read in the reviews and then some.A few of my favorite features:The keyboard is Swype enabled.  Might not seem like a big deal to some, but I'm so used to swyping on my android, tapping away at the keyboard slows me down.  On my old kindle, I gave up on accessing email, doc applications, and even writing reviews :)  There's also a voice recording function.  Simply put, I can do so much more on this device than I could on the old Fire.After reading multiple reviews on how the processor speed puts the Nexus 7 and iPad to shame.... I can tell you it's absolutely true.Bluetooth...and the range is pretty great.Front facing camera along with the improved screen resolution is great for video chat on Skype and imo"Collections" feature for both apps and books.  While I still wish someone could come up with a stellar app to import all my books into some type of folder or collection hierarchy, this feature is still an improvement.Audio books are now part of the menu instead of having to run them through the Audible app.  Not only do they download faster, they run better.Technical specs aside...part of what makes a great device is the UI/UX.... little features that improve usability and overall user experience are critical, and Amazon really did nail it with this device.
Reviews.Title: Amazon really nailed it with this device

Reviews.Author: CW FISHER "stars for connie"
Reviews.Content: This is my third kindle and I am enjoying this one very much.  The things I like about this one you can see page number and location number on the kindle.  It has a camera that can take pictures from the front and the back. The books are easy to read and I am enjoying playing scrabble on my kindle.  It is light weight and it has a large screen.  I do not look at movies just books, comic books, and sometimes my audio books.  I am very please with this kindle.  What I dislike about the kindle is it is not light on the outside letting you know that the battery have finish charging.  In other electronics you do not want to overcharge the battery but you have to turn in on to check to see if the battery is fully charged unless you cannot overcharge the battery that the device cuts off the charging when it is full I do not know.
Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle

Reviews.Author: Renee Hall
Reviews.Content: I REALLY LOVE MY KINDLE but it keeps falling off line I have called my helper several times and it will work for one good day and then stop again.if someone can help please please help me out
Reviews.Title: The fire keeps going out on my kindle

Reviews.Author: Evert Meulie
Reviews.Content: Very nice, all and all. A bit cumbersome that some apps need to be installed via a 3rd party app store because the Amazon app store either doesn't have them, or they're hopelessly outdated.
Reviews.Title: Nice, but some apps are cumbersome to install...

Reviews.Author: Angela Williams
Reviews.Content: I cannot begin to express how dark and dull my life was before this amazing machine showed up on my doorstep.  We are now rarely apart, we do everything together.I bought a bluetooth keyboard at a discount with an Amazon local deal and now I can actually tolerate writing reviews, such as this one.It has changed me.  I'm a much more interesting person than I was before.
Reviews.Title: Just chillin with my Kindle

Reviews.Author: Margaret
Reviews.Content: I am having some problems with it though.  It freezes up frequently and has to be rebooted frequently. Occasionally it doesn't start at all and seems dead, but if you hold the on/off button for more than 20 seconds it wil reboot.  Anything less than 20 seconds won't work.  I am still getting used to it and finding new things to do with it.  It should come with a detailed instruction book, but did not.  Had to borrow a book on Amazon prime to get how to use it.  For something so expensive it should come with detailed instructions.Margaret
Reviews.Title: I like it

Reviews.Author: C. Celestine
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire HDX 8.9!! I had a Kindle Fire, but it died (RIP, Sweet Pea) so I purchased this one & I would not trade it for anything. It's so much faster and the battery lasts longer. It doesn't take long to load up during start-up like the Kindle Fire did and there are more apps included like a clock, a calendar, and Goodreads, which I absolutely love! I am so happy I made the upgrade to this version of Kindle Fire.
Reviews.Title: So much better!!

Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: Great device. I just bought on and love it.However I got annoyed at all these special offers on the lock screen and on the home tab.Amazon discloses that they will be there, Best Buy doesn't. None of them discloses that you will have to pay $15 to get rid of them, even when you click on "learn more".Amazon claims that these ads don't interfer with the use of the tablet, but they do. They popped up several times  while i was playing Fruit Ninja and actually paused the game.We called Amazon customer service and at first the rep said that we didn't read carefully all the fine print. We told him that we got it from Best Buy, because the same model was $40 cheaper than Amazon, and they had no information anywhere about these "special Offers".  He was understanding, waived the $15, told us to restart the device and they were gone!That's the reason I will give only 4 stars. The sellers should be more upfront about these things.Otherwise, it was very easy to get started, since I had a first generation Kindle Fire HD. As soon as I entered the account info, everything got automatically uploaded. E-mail was much easier to set up that the previous model, and it now supports Outlook. Good camera, not I would really be caught taking a picture or a movie holding a big flat thing in front of me :). Like the way that the camera is activated when you lift the device from the origami case. Also the Kindle conveniently turns of or turns on when you close or open the case.Great battery life, going on 3 days of heavy use, still trying to get it empty so I can power cycle it. Handles wifi from our wacko router much better than my laptop.
Reviews.Title: Hidden $15 fee to get rid of annoying special offers

Reviews.Author: Lori F
Reviews.Content: I love the new kindle fire HDX 64g 8.9. I was already a kindle owner of a 7" 8 g, which was a gift last Christmas when I became new to the internet but I realized I was almost out of memory which is why I purchased the 64g and went with the larger screen. I've chosen this rating just because I haven't been able to use all of its features yet.. There has been a problem with editing the calendar, which amazon technicians are working on to resolve as quickly as possible. The photos are fantastic and with having the front and rear facing camera makes it easier to use. The picture quality is great and watching a movie is so clear. I believe the best feature that was developed was being able to print from my kindle. I recommend this product to everyone, it is a great little laptop.
Reviews.Title: kindle fire HDX 64g 8.9" is the perfect little "laptop" for home or on the go

Reviews.Author: trixie
Reviews.Content: Love my Kindle, way nicer than my 2 yr old nook. I can read at night & it doesn't bother my eyes at all.  With my nook I'd be reading a really good book over the weekend & the color to read with would cause so much eyestrain that glasses & giant letters wouldn't help me everything was still fuzzy so I'd have to quit reading. Now it's no problem at all.  I can read all day & all night.  Still do not need my glasses or the giant letters. And the video is awesome!!!!
Reviews.Title: hd rocks

Reviews.Author: David Lorden
Reviews.Content: I was having trouble with my Kindle Fire and was able to troubleshoot the problem by going to the Amazon site.  Great customer service and even better product!
Reviews.Title: Love My Kindle Fire

Reviews.Author: Nancie Cornwall
Reviews.Content: Very easy to use. Great display, sound quality and apps.  The "help" feature is outstanding.  I like the fact that it syncs to my kindle and I downloaded a free manual for the tablet.
Reviews.Title: Everything the commercials claim!

Reviews.Author: Cheri MorningStar
Reviews.Content: The color is beyond belief.  Characters in a locale you don't know?  Speaking to each other by song titles?  Need an instant dictionary?  A few taps and pictures, music, word definitions are instant.  You can put books by genre, author lists.  Down stream movies, Netflix or HBO GO.  This Kindle is awesome.
Reviews.Title: Interactive Reading

Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I really love this little device!  Very easy to use and comfortable to handle.  I've used it for email, social media, reading books, etc.  I haven't watched a movie yet but that's next.  The pictures are amazing as well.  Great purchase for the price!  Highly recommend.
Reviews.Title: KINDLE FIRE

Reviews.Author: Mike A.
Reviews.Content: It is perfect for consuming content.  Nice size and easy to carry around in a jacket pocket (I have some big ones!).The picture quality is superb.  Really enjoying it.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire

Reviews.Author: F &T
Reviews.Content: I can read a book, watch Netflix, watch Amazon Prime movies or tv shows, play games, accesses the internet, read the news of the day, get the weather forecast! Whats not to like!!!!
Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle!

Reviews.Author: Steve Martin
Reviews.Content: Bought this for the wife for Christmas and she loves it. So much so, I have to hide the charger to get some alone time... I would write more, but she doesn't let me use it. I can tell you that I can read the screen clearly from the next seat over.
Reviews.Title: Great gift idea

Reviews.Author: S. Lichty "TeacherMom"
Reviews.Content: Hey y'all! Thanks for indulging me for a minute. I bought the 7 inch version, then returned it for the bigger one. I love them both, but the bigger one is  a better size for me, and it has a couple extras such as front and rear cameras and a little sharper image. It starts up fast, and it is convenient. As a prime student member, I can borrow one book a month from the Amazon owner's library. Pretty awesome!However, the silk browser, which is the kindle browser doesn't support flash. So many online games and such will not work on your kindle. I've read online about how to download a flash app for kindle and a different browser, but c'mon Amazon! Why should I have to go through the hassle? Why can't you just update Silk to support flash, and give us a flash app yourself? Should be very easy.Lastly, you cannot use the g---le play store on kindle. This is a shame because you can often get some apps cheaper at one versus the Amazon app store. I like to have options! So if we could rix these two minor issues, I could have given my kindle fire hdx 8.9 a 5 star rating!
Reviews.Title: Love my kindle Fire HDX. Wish it had FLASH!

Reviews.Author: angiebc
Reviews.Content: I really love the new Kindle Fire HDX. The picture quality is great. It's light weight and just the right size to slip into your bag of choice.
Reviews.Title: Great Product!

Reviews.Author: Jacqueline Dana
Reviews.Content: I loved my first generation kindle fire but when I started having problems I went to the HDX 8.9.  I love it except for one thing.  The battery life isn't long enough for me.  Of course I use it for 4 hours usually at a time.  I've been know to read a couple of books at a sitting so it might be my fault.  I love the kindle and will always have one.
Reviews.Title: wonderful

Reviews.Author: grandma
Reviews.Content: I LOVE MAY KINDLE FIRE.  IT HAS BEEN A GREAT SOURCE OF PLEASURE.  I use it for face book, e-mail and games.
Reviews.Title: GREAT

Reviews.Author: Melissa
Reviews.Content: Would give the kindle fire hdx 8.9 5 stars but it freezes at least 2x a day and it gets very frustrating
Reviews.Title: Great but.....,,

Reviews.Author: Albert D Barksdale
Reviews.Content: Excellent play and operation provided you have a fast internet Wi-Fi. Otherwise it doesn't perform so good. Well, nor does any computer or laptop. Definition and viewing is great and everything else is fine. The charge holds good.The key is a good Wi-Fi. Without it, you might be a little frustrated.
Reviews.Title: HDX 8.9 Blazes

Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: It's still not as user friendly as an IPad but it does have high quality pictures. I am going to download a manual so I better understand it
Reviews.Title: Good for the price

Reviews.Author: Anita
Reviews.Content: This is my fourth Kindle purchase and it is awesome.  I am a huge fan of the Kindle family and would never consider any other tablet.  I started with the 7" black and white reader (which I still own) and advanced to each upgraded device as they became available.  The Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 is, in my opinion, the perfect tablet and e reader.  The colors on this KIndle Fire is amazing.  Reading and watching movies on the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 is unbelievable.  You have to experience it to know just how awesome it is, TV commercials and the computer screen does not convey the clarity of this device.  I love the great customer service that Amazon offers, especially the mayday service that is offered with the Kindle Fire HDX, and the ease of purchasing swiftly through Amazon.  I have become a huge Amazon fan through my Kindles.  Keep up the great work Amazon!
Reviews.Title: Love it!

Reviews.Author: Terry L. Broadbent "tlbroadbent"
Reviews.Content: I had an original 7" Kindle Fire. I made good use of it but ran up against its limitations - slow processor, limited memory and storage. I couldn't load all of the Apps that I wanted and many ran very slowly and frequently stopped. I also found the 7" screen limiting for the things I wanted to do.The 8.9" Kindle Fire HDX with 32GB and WiFi meets my needs very well. The quad-core processor makes this a fast and very responsive tablet. I've not had any problems loading and running the Apps that I want. The Silk browser doesn't fail on some web pages like the original Kindle Fire.The display is outstanding. I love the 8.9" screen.Sound is adequate but volume still seems weak. I usually listen with headphones so this isn't a big issue.I can now leave my laptop at home when I travel because the Kindle Fire HDX does what I need.
Reviews.Title: Love My New Kindle Fire HDX!

Reviews.Author: Carol M. in NC "nurseicm"
Reviews.Content: i love the new kindle fire hdx not only was it a good deal with amazon allowing the purchase in 90 day increments, it is really light weight, thinner than previous kindle fire. only thing that makes it heavy is the otterbox i also purchased for protection since i am slightly clumsy and prone to dropping things. I love the display and the clarity of videos and movies i enjoy. love to read, still exploring the whole thing it is definately different from kindle fire. I really dont like the book or video recommendations that show up under the book carousel. And i still am looking for a way to list faves like the other kindle, since im exploring i will either find it or i wont so its not a big issue......
Reviews.Title: love it

Reviews.Author: Gloria S. Wells
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire has great sound and good picture. The only complaint I have is touching the power button accidentally turns it off too quickly.  Needs to have a delay in shutting down.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire

Reviews.Author: Alex G
Reviews.Content: I waited for this version over getting an iPad because I'm an Amazon Prime member and you can download loads of the already included Prime content and watch offline. I read on this and watch way too many TV shows and movies. I've never regretted getting this over an iPad (like my wife owns) for a second.
Reviews.Title: Can't put it down

Reviews.Author: Movie fan "good books only!"
Reviews.Content: Ok, I'm going to be honest here. I own an ipad 4 with retina display and a google nexus 7 as well as having a windows phone and having had an android phone in the past. I like all variations of tech and prefer to be immersed in all instead of being ridiculously close minded and loyal to only one. Each has its own merits.  I bought the Kindle for my kids because they have the option of the lending library and I can control their time on the device. I have an amazon prime account, which in this case, is a plus. All of my already owned apps via the amazon app store were automatically downloaded as well as any kindle books I've purchased in the past.  The amazon app store does not have near the breadth of the apps that the ipad is but they have the major ones for game playing including ones the boys really like like minecraft pocket edition, angry birds go, etc. The most limiting app store would be that for the windows phone. Not the case with this device. You can also buy amazon coins on amazon so you have purchasing power for any apps in the store and depending on how man you buy, I believe you can save up to $10. Assuming you are going to spend that much on apps. It's not good towards books.  The OS on the kindle is good. It is lightning fast, has all of the settings at your fingertips and I've had 0 problems so far.  It holds a charge as well as the ipad with consistent use and the charging port is easy to access and secure. I'm still getting used to the buttons on the back but I like that I cant accidentally hit the home button. I actually have to go for it. The nexus 7 is disappointing as far as battery life goes and the charging port. Within two months of having the nexus, I had to ship it off to have the charging port replaced. The ipad I've replaced twice due to a malfunctioning home key and the wifi not working at all. I have cellular service on the ipad but do not on the kindle. I almost wish I did to see how well it functions.  Kindle has an incredible photo editing program. The photos it takes are as good as those the ipad takes (I don't expect much from tablet devices) and I was shocked to see the variety of editing features the program offered without having to buy an extra app. You could make a meme, add stickers, crop, etc. Many things as well as sharing features. Kindle is not compatible with instagram yet, which is a shame. It just became compatible with windows in December of last year. Hopefully this will be resolved soon.  Also, the Kindle has the unique and convenient feature (like the nexus 7) of typing by swiping the word across the keyboard. It is amazingly accurate, fast and easy to use once you practice once or twice. Because of the size of the screen and the touch accuracy, I've used it often on the Kindle if I've needed to type.  The only truly disappointing thing for me which may sound trivial is the fact you cannot personalize the background or lock screen. I paid the extra $15 not to be inundated with commercials because ultimately this is my device, not Amazon's to sell stuff to me. Even if they are great offers, I shouldn't have to feel like I have to buy something if I want to turn the thing on for the kids, etc. There is a pin lock screen available, just like the ipad. It does not have facial recognition or pattern offered like the nexus 7, though.  Mostly, I have been satisfied with this device. I have no real complaints and I care about performance and the visual screen first. The screen is beautiful. I like looking at it better than my ipad. The reason I got the ipad over a year ago was for the screen. Now they have better options. However, I like my ipad for the apps.  For kids, for reading, for those with an amazon account, this is perfect!  If you have any questions, feel free to contact me. I'm happy to answer.
Reviews.Title: Great screen and light

Reviews.Author: DD
Reviews.Content: My Kindle Fire HDX is everything I expected and more.  I love the fact that I can dictate emails without having to type them out.  The colors are very vivid and all functions work very quickly.
Reviews.Title: Everything I expected and more!

Reviews.Author: t.holmes
Reviews.Content: When I purchased my first Kindle Fire I was very frustrated with it because I didn't know how to use it and it was hard to find someone to show me how to use the tablet and the same when I purchased the Kindle Fire HD 8.9.  I found it difficult to even find a telephone number for Amazon so I could call someone to tell me how to use the tablet.  I complained to Amazon about the lack of not having a company or someone locally who could help teach me how to use the table.  I was really frustrated because I wasn't able to take good pictures with the Kindle Fire HD 8.9 since it didn't have a back camera.  Oh, but baby!  Extra! Extra!  Read all about it! I know somebody really loves me because I got the new Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 as a Christmas present! Let me tell you now about my new Kindle Fire HDX 8.9.  I am now the proud owner of a Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 and every time I use this tablet, it's a new day with a new play!  Kindle Fire has stepped up it's game!  I can take great pictures all day long because it now has a front and back camera.  I now am a believer, that for the price, IPADs don't have anything any more on Kindle Fire HDX 8.9. I love using the May Day which have live people showing you how to navigate the table.  The May Day People are fun to talk to and make me feel at ease. The Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 is much lighter.  I really love watching movies on my Kindle.  I like the new, improved "Contact List" app. The one disappointment with the new Kindle Fire HDX is the "Office Suite" that was advertised as being a integral part of Kindle Fire HDX 8.9  which doesn't seem to exist.  I'm not sure this app exist because there isn't an "Office Suite" icon on my Kindle Fire HDX 8.9.  It's been confusing as to why the "Office Suite" is not on the tablet as advertised.  May Day People weren't able to explain to me in a manner that I can understand why the app icon is not on the device and weren't able to clearly explain how I should use this app. Not having the "Office Suite" icon app on my new Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 is the only area where I feel slighted because that is one of the main reasons I purchased this new tablet. Otherwise, I most definitely am very satisfied with my new Kindle Fire HDX 8.9.  One other thing, Kindle Fire has also improved with the number of great movies and books that can be obtained if one purchases "Prime Time" each year. This is the first time I've purchased "Prime Time" since I began getting Kindle Fires. I am glad I paid the prime time fee because I've seen some great movies on my Kindle Fire HDX 8.9. It's so much fun watching a movie on my Kindle while I'm lying in bed! With the Kindle Fire, one is able to store music in the cloud.  One last thing, on this past Sunday, when I visited my sister who was using her Kindle Fire HD 8.9 while I used my Kindle Fire HDX 8.9, we could differently see the big and improved differences in the newest tablet.  Now, my sister is eager to get the new Kindle Fire HDX 8.9.
Reviews.Title: Now This Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 Is GREAT!  Love It!

Reviews.Author: Lin Boffeli
Reviews.Content: Love it.  It is my constant companion. It is fast and the color is wonderful. You should buy it today.
Reviews.Title: Love it!

Reviews.Author: Fawn  K.  Williams
Reviews.Content: Best money I've spent in a long time. Have wanted one forever..If I'd have known what I was missing I'd of bought a Kindle years ago. My eyes don't focus well so I picked the black background with white print, reading is so easy now. I don't have to keep looking away from the page so my eyes can re-focus. Awesome if you don't have a lot of extra space for bookcases. Love that I can check my email, facebook and play my games. Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 is so much more than an e-reader...you won't be disapointed.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9

Reviews.Author: Mr. Mike W. Naylor
Reviews.Content: Pretty simple.  I Love this thing and Amazon has is right. I can watch on all my devices no BS.  I love that.
Reviews.Title: Love it

Reviews.Author: Tigerlaw
Reviews.Content: This is hands down the best deal in tablets. The presentation is stunning, compared to everything else. May day is a great plus.
Reviews.Title: What a great tool

Reviews.Author: demo 717
Reviews.Content: The resolution on the HDX is like no other. My wife has an ipad and the resolution on the HDX is much better.It's incredibly light and fast, very happy to say the least.No doubt this is the most bang for your buck.
Reviews.Title: Amazing!

Reviews.Author: Stacey*FamilyKindleCoffeLover*
Reviews.Content: I've had no problems with this product so far.  The screen is clear and good quality.  I mainly use this device for reading, but it has been handy for using the other apps such as games for my kids and using goodreads.Downloading books from Amazon is very quick and I like that all of my recent purchases are on the home screen ready to go. I had an older version of kindle and was able to transfer all the folders and books easily.  I found adding my purchases and maneuvering between folders and screens easy.It did take a couple of days to get used to the screen as my old one was the Kindle DX - not backlit.  The new kindle means I don't need to have extra light which was a major selling point for me.The battery life seems quite long, I can generally get nearly 2 full days of reading before having to charge. I bought this device because it claimed to have a longer battery life than an ipad if used for mainly reading.I'm happy with my kindle purchase and will continue using Amazon for my book purchases.
Reviews.Title: No problems so far

Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I bought this Kindle fire hdx as a Christmas gift to myself. I wanted to step up a bit with new technology from my old kindle fire and I am just unsure of my purchase. It was bought 28th November, 2013 and since I am living out of the USA my relative ship it to me. I was so excited when I received it on the 16th December and started to use it immediately. I love the feel of it ,larger screen and sound quality. Unfortunately, I was very disappointed and frustrated on 31st December,2013 when it refused to power on. After several tries and troubleshooting it came on. So I am going to update my review as time progress but for now I going to say it's okay.
Reviews.Title: I am still unsure of my Kindle Fire HDX 8.9", HDX Display, Wi-Fi, 32 GB - Includes Special Offers (Electronics

Reviews.Author: Ron Cooper
Reviews.Content: I'm still rather new to this device as I actually unboxed it on Christmas.  I would consider myself a power user that must push the boundaries of making a device do what I would like it to do.  I rooted my Nexus 7 so I can use apps like Titanium Backup Pro, etc.  However, I was getting tired of needing to root and deal with that headache and just get a device that works.  The Kindle HDX is a beautiful device and interface.  I have enjoyed it so far, but there are a bunch of App compatibility issues that I immediately ran into.I'll keep this short and maybe revisit and expand after I have had more time to settle in with this device.Pros:Beautiful display and I\interfaceIntegration with Amazon contentHandles about 80% of what I want to do with a tabletBook reading has been pleasant so farSpeakers and audio sound really good coming from a tabletCons:Locked into Silk BrowserLast Pass seems a little weird - not tied to Silk Browser - uses an embedded Dolphin browser I believe - wish this was integrated into Silk with a plugin or somethingNo Google integration - you don't know you miss it until it's not there any moreLack of GPSApps in the Amazon app store are not the same revision as current ones in the Google Play storeThings like Candy Crush - since its an older version, I'm missing features I get on my Google based devicesStuff I purchased in Google Play I cannot easily get to Kindle Fire or if I do it might not be supported (if I sideload something)Price.  Due to being so locked in to the Amazon marketplace, I feel this device should be priced lower or I wouldn't have a problem paying more if more of my apps worked out of the box.In short, there are challenges that need to be overcome on a directional level from Amazon.  I'm not sure why developers or Amazon are not keeping Apps up to date or what is preventing developers from moving to the Amazon Marketplace, but if I were Amazon I'd be addressing these issues.  If I had more compatibility and flexibility I wouldn't have such a problem losing a few apps, but the percentage is too high for me to give a 4 or 5 star review as the current device and platform sit.Companies that try to limit what we want or can do with these devices are going to pay the price, by losing users and sales.  It seems Amazon is following Apple's model more closely than Google's.  I'm happy with a mix in the middle.  Considered sending this back to Amazon but I'll wait it out some more and see how things go.  I would really like this device to replace all of my others but right now it is a complimentary tablet to my phone and other tablet usage.
Reviews.Title: Review coming from a Nexus 7 user

Reviews.Author: D. Boyle
Reviews.Content: I have the original Kindle Fire--so I was pleasantly surprised by how light and sleek the HDX is. The display is great and I'm pleased by how fast the web browser is. Hulu Plus and Netflix also work perfectly.
Reviews.Title: Totally Satisfied

Reviews.Author: Wile E's Mom
Reviews.Content: What a treat to be able to easily and clearly see the content. Very bright, very crisp.  And the simplicity of use!  Hardly a learning curve!
Reviews.Title: joy

Reviews.Author: David Ziring
Reviews.Content: My wife won't let go of this - she now watches more movies and TV shows on the HDX than on the television.It's not nearly as portable as the 7" tablets, but much easier to use.
Reviews.Title: Great screen and functionality

Reviews.Content: I have tried the smaller kindle we bought one for my husband. I thought it was to small. I love this size. It is easy to put  it in my purse and go. Big enough to see without enlarging the page. So many free apps and games.  My daughter has an IPad and this is so much better. I also recommend this pad if your new to using a pad it has the May day feature that you just can,t beat. I have had to use it and the support Tec was fast super nice. Made it an easy fix. I love my kindle.
Reviews.Title: i love this kindle fire 8.9 HDX.

Reviews.Author: carol piazza
Reviews.Content: First of all I am a senior . This is great , I love it. I have a computer so I do know a little. I am enjoying  it.l learn something new every day.Carol
Reviews.Title: my new info center

Reviews.Author: C. Ellis
Reviews.Content: Much better than the 1st generation.  Lightweight, fast, love the increased storage space.  Makes me want to read more.  Easy to navigate.
Reviews.Title: Love it

Reviews.Author: English teacher
Reviews.Content: I love the Kindle Fire HDX … vivid screen, easy to use … all that Amazon advertises it to be. Amazon did a great job on delivery time too! If you're an Amazon prime customer, you can't go wrong with this.
Reviews.Title: I'm a happy consumer.

Reviews.Author: abacus
Reviews.Content: This is not a tablet for everybody. If one wants a tablet with a fully accessible operating system, this is not for you. Get a Samsung Note 10 2014 or an iPad Air. If you are a regular participant in the Amazon universe and you want to read both books and magazines, and consume other material that needs a superb screen, buy the Fire HDX.Screen quality is as good as the best of the other tablets and the device is lighter. It is designed to promote and facilitate the sale of Amazon products and Amazon is upfront about this. This concept works for me and I am very pleased with the device.
Reviews.Title: Truly Excellent Specialized Device

Reviews.Author: E. Wenzel
Reviews.Content: Screen is good. Sound not so much. The rear facing speakers are pretty weak. Battery life is good. The power and volume buttons on the back side leave the kids complaining. The back plate that forms the body has a fairly sharp edge that catches a little on things. However the performance of the kindle fire was nice and responsive. So overall a good device with a few drawbacks.
Reviews.Title: Good with a few drawbacks

Reviews.Author: Gary Lewis "Gerald L Lewis"
Reviews.Content: I've been a Kindle customer and fan since the first one came out (I lost one and now own 3 including a 2nd generation 7", a DX, and now the Fire HDX). I also use the Kindle Windows client on my desktop and Microsoft Surface RT device. For my money, the HDX is the best platform for reading books and watching movies of them all. I particularly like the fact that I was able to download multiple high-quality movies that I can watch comfortably using my Bluetooth headphones, on the device since I don't always have WiFi access. I already have moved 6 movies and about 40 books to the device and I still have over 20GB available space. I've also installed several productivity applications and, OK, a couple of games as well. I'm extremely pleased with the speed of the device (downloading a book over WiFi occurs in seconds) and the quality of the display and sound. I chose the 32GB version without special offers. The Kindle HDX will be a very hard act to follow!
Reviews.Title: Outstanding tablet!

Reviews.Author: Cheyenne Harris "Cmarie"
Reviews.Content: This is the best tablet ever. I am so happy with it! The 30 day trial was perfect so I could try this out and see what I was missing.
Reviews.Title: love it

Reviews.Author: Madeline Starnes
Reviews.Content: I love the kindle fire it's light weight and easy to use. The screen is beautiful!  I currently own an iPad 2 so the screen technology isn't the greatest. I like the design of the kindle except for the material of the back. Not sure why but it was hard to keep clean. I would have kept the kindle but I just couldn't afford it after the free trial. Great tablet for someone who is looking to buy a tablet but isn't sure which to buy. I also liked how your amazon account was integrated throughout the kindle made purchasing books or apps super easy!!!
Reviews.Title: Love the new kindle fire!!!

Reviews.Author: Jon Williquette
Reviews.Content: I have loved this tablet since the moment I opened the box! It's an amazing piece of work, and I'm proud to say I own one. The only little thing that I dislike about it is the scrolling carousel on the home page. Seems a bit unnecessary to me, but no big deal. Thanks Amazon for creating a great tablet!
Reviews.Title: FANTASTIC!!

Reviews.Author: RUBY E NARANJO
Reviews.Content: I was pleasantly surprised how easy it is to use this tablet...no problems whatsoever.  Love it and would recommend to friends and family.
Reviews.Title: kindle fire

Reviews.Author: Barbara J. Esmedina
Reviews.Content: Fantastic tablet. I bought as a gift for my 81 year old mother and she loves it. She finally keeps  up with her email. I have an iPad I received as a gift, it is a joke as far as functionality goes compared to the Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Title: Better than the iPad

Reviews.Author: Cynthia
Reviews.Content: I have only had my Kindle two days so can't be sure yet how everything works, but so far I am doing well with it.  I find that the black buttons on the black frame of the Kindle are hard for me to see however.  Wish that the on and off, etc. buttons could have been in silver or another color to help me locate them better.  Once I get to know more about the features I will update my review but for a first timer using a Kindle I will say that my ten year old granddaughter is doing great at figuring things out, thus I am not having much trouble either as she is guiding me along.  (laugh). One thing that I really wish the Kindle had was a slot to keep my stylus.  Neither the Kindle nor the case has any place to secure a stylus and that is really inconvenient to me.  Thank you.Cynthia
Reviews.Title: GOING WELL AFTER ONLY TWO DAYS OF HAVING MY KINDLE

Reviews.Author: TamiLee
Reviews.Content: Amazing quality with a great price! My whole family loves it, hard to get my hands on it when anyone is home.
Reviews.Title: Worth every penny!

Reviews.Author: Beverly A. Davis
Reviews.Content: Beautiful Screen & colors, Sound is incredible, & processor is super fast. Silk is a great browser. I think this is the best tablet for the money.
Reviews.Title: Great Tablet!!!

Reviews.Author: Tireguy510
Reviews.Content: This is a really nice tablet. I was fortunate to be invited to try it by Amazon for 30 days free. Light, easy to carry and FAST! Much faster than my iPad. Screen is beautiful and far superior to the Retina. I compared the Kindle side by side and WOW! Dolby speakers to boot, so you know the sound is going to be better than most other tablets. I had an Android phone before, so I already had a good understanding of the OS. That being said, here are some things that could be improved. The OS is not as fluid or as intuitive as Apple. Not a surprise here. And the battery life is NOT as advertised. The iPad can last up to three days with light to moderate use. The Kindle will run all the way down the night before, charge all night, and before 9 AM, the battery will be depleted 10%. So, I strongly dispute that claim about battery life. I have not used the Mayday button yet and didn't even know about that feature until the Kindle arrived. I really like that part of it and I think that it sets the Fire apart. It's nice to have instant help if needed and I think that Amazon is on to something here. Also, if you have Prime, this is your device. For videos, your watch list and all access to anything Amazon offers is literally at your fingertips. Same goes for shopping. It is quite easy and dangerous! LOL It was hard to stay off the Fire some days. I will be returning the Kindle due to costs, not desire. Would I recommend this? Absolutely, positively, 100% YES!!!!! It is a device that is great now, and only going to get better.
Reviews.Title: Fantastic device and screen with some minor flaws.

Reviews.Author: This is not my life
Reviews.Content: I'm very unhappy with my Kindle HDX, it's slow, movies are not crisp and clear and they skip. I doesn't respond to touch well at all. I tried contacting Amazon to return this because it was one day past my 30-day window and I couldn't do it online through the return window.  I am extremely disappointed and can't believe with as much as I've spent on this and and how much I spend at Amazon, nobody cares.  I was really looking forward to getting this Kindle after reading all the good reviews, now I just get frustrated every time I have to use it. I purchased the original Kindle when it first came out, I bought my son a Paperwhite Kindle, which he loves and my other son has the Kindle fire, we are satisfied with those, but this is a big let down.
Reviews.Title: Doesn't live up to my expectations

Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: I got the chance to try out the Kindle HDX 8.9" thanks to a free 30 day trial from Amazon. I've been on the fence about tablets for a long time, I consider them more of a novelty than a need and I thought this was the perfect opportunity to make up my mind. The HDX is a very attractive device, it feels good in your hand and the rubbery material looks great. It's also extremely light, The screen has an incredible resolution and looks outstanding when browsing and playing around. The sound is also excellent as well. There were a few things however I wasn't too impressed with. The Silk browser is meh at times, the app store is lacking, the buttons are located in weird spots, and the OS is just too integrated with Amazon. The OS isn't hard to get used to and the set up is easy but after about 3 days of use the novelty kind of wore off for me. It's an excellent device but I don't see the real need for it. It doesn't feel like the tablet would be able to do anything else but browse the web, read books, and watch movies. For a device that is close to $400 that isn't enough. I would rather spent the extra money on the Surface 2 which at least gets you Microsoft Office. I'm giving it four stars because I feel the device has a great build, great screen, is light, and does what its suppose to do very well. I just think it's a little overpriced and for the money there are a lot better options. The OS could use some work, either way if you love Amazon and use it all the time this is the perfect device for you
Reviews.Title: Excellent device but not for me

Reviews.Author: JH
