} cv_mo33PE4QAXIAWWDpreplay.onmouseout = function() { cv_mo33PE4QAXIAWWDpreplay.src = "http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/81JTzuFHyjS._SX320_PHcustomer-video-vignette_PIvideo-reviews-bottom,BottomLeft,0,43_OU01_PIcustomer-video-play,BottomLeft,130,-12_CR0,0,0,0_.png"; } var node = cv_mo33PE4QAXIAWWDpreplay.parentNode; var cv_mo33PE4QAXIAWWDcurrentClick = node.onclick; node.onclick = function () { var head = document.getElementsByTagName("head"); if (head[0]) { var logTag = document.createElement('script'); logTag.type = "text/javascript"; logTag.src = "/gp/customer-media/du/log.html/ref=cm_ciu_vr_mo33PE4QAXIAWWD/185-2488423-4562533?ie=UTF8&p=CustomerImage&s=CustomerVideoPlay"; head[0].appendChild(logTag); } if (cv_mo33PE4QAXIAWWDcurrentClick) { return cv_mo33PE4QAXIAWWDcurrentClick(); } } } Length:: 1:30 MinsI've had the kindle HDX 8.9 for about a week now. It's ok. I also own an ipad and I'm trying not to compare the two but it is hard not to. I agree with other reviewers that the amazon AppStore is lacking. The kindle will play amazon movies without a hitch including prime if you are a member. I've needed mayday 3 times. Twice for problems with downloading apps and once because of a problem with the camera. The answer every time is reset the device. Every time! Which doesn't work by the way. One major annoyance is that when using the rear camera while in a magnetic case there is an animation that blocks your view. It tells you to slide up your device. The kindle basically doesn't want to be in a magnetic case while taking a pictured. However, since the magnetic case doesn't interfere with taking a picture it is just annoying while I blocks your view. I hope that it will be removed in a future update. At the very least, there should be a setting option that allows you to remove the reminder alert from the middle of the screen. Other than that, the kindle is fine. You just need to be conscious of the (limited) market you are buying into.
Reviews.Title: Software could use an update, but it's ok

Reviews.Author: M. Epstein
Reviews.Content: Great tablet and a perfect way to enjoy Amazon Prime benefits.  Specifically, I LOVE being able to download TV shows and movies for the plane when I don't have wifi.  The tablet is fast and smart and the screen is beautiful.  I sold my iPad mini to get the HDX 8.9" and so far I'm very pleased with my decision.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" is a beautiful tablet

Reviews.Author: Calin N Borca
Reviews.Content: Kindle,  great reading device. Amazing screen and it's fast. Why only 3 stars then? This is supposed to be a media device on top of just being able to read books. Being that most media apps from Google aren't available on kindle, that's a full star off. On top of that the battery performance is pretty poor. The lack of apps, due to Amazon's greed I'm sure, makes this less of a media tablet and more of an overpriced digital reading device. Overall, these two big negatives make me wish I would have bought another device.
Reviews.Title: want a media tablet? look somewhere else.

Reviews.Author: JanJan
Reviews.Content: Sent it back and bought the newest version of the iPad.  Love iPad, the Kindle was anti-climatic.  Of course, I have an android phone (that I hate….waiting with bated breath to get a larger screen iPhone if/when they come out.  I also have a MacBook Pro.  I guess I'm just an apple girl.
Reviews.Title: Returned it, just wasn't impressed

Reviews.Author: Kripa T.
Reviews.Content: I have had a first gen kindle but it was too slow and i wanted to upgrade it. I went for a refurbished Kindle HD. I was not happy as i had Apps crashing issues. I bought this when it went to $339 sale 2-3 weeks ago. As usual prime shipping i had it in 2 days. The color and picture quality is so vibrant. The sound is breath taking. Much better than IPAD mini or IPAD i have had. I am a prime member and it is a bonus that i could download my rental and certain prime videos. I have already bought kindle book rental for month of April. I also downloaded 2 books which is a free offer for kindle owners. I also love Kindle free time for kids and i can set the timings on weekdays and weekends. I do not need to monitor as the kindle shuts it off. I have not had a chance to experience May Day service but i am sure it is revolutionary. Amazon has decent number of Apps but would be great if they had google play available. I have HBO Go, directv App, ESPN app all working perfectly fine. It comes with a charger unlike the other Kindles which is a huge plus. After i bought it went on sale with a extra 10% off for PRIME members and i contacted CS reps and within 5 min i was refunded. So i ended up paying $305. Great price for this power house! If you are thinking of buying pull the trigger !!Update: used the camera much better than iPad mini and photos gets automatically stored in the cloud. Skype works perfect too.
Reviews.Title: The Killer Kindle!

Reviews.Author: F. One
Reviews.Content: If you have Amazon Prime the Kindle Fire tables are the only mobile devices you can watch Amazon TV from.  The tablet it self is very fast, responsive, and light.  The display is is vibrant and sharp.  Kindle books and magazines function better than the kindle app for Android or IOS.  The only negative keeping this from being five stars is the abstinence of Google apps.  If Amazon gets these app this will be the perfect tablet for me hands down.
Reviews.Title: Amazing but no Google support

Reviews.Author: KulaKop
Reviews.Content: Amazing product!!! Bought my 7 year old son the HDX 7 version and was so impressed by it that I bought the HDX 8.9 version for myself!!! I was an Apple guy for the last 10 years plus and this kindle has turned me into a traitor. Great everything. I live on Maui and this was delivered on the 10th of February from New Jersey it made it to me on the 11th!!!! One day?! Love AMAZON!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Title: The greatest thing since SLICED BREAD!!!!

Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: Great tablet for Media, Surfing, and Amazon ecosystem.If you need a light-weight tablet for playing Media, for surfing or for using the Amazon ecosystem (Kindle e-reader, Amazon shopping, Amazon cloud service, Amazon Instant Video, etc) then this is it!  Well, I setup 3 of these for my wife and kids and while I found this tablet lacking on the technical/features side (I prefer Windows 8 tablets for that matter,) my wife and kids loved it, ironically, for these same reasons. Since it is a locked-down, and watered-down version of Android, it is not overly overwhelming in features, making it easier to use for kids and non-technical people. So this tablet fills this niche perfectly. And the 4G LTE option makes it a great portable tablet on the go (travel/beach/school/etc.)To nitpick, I'm surprised Amazon didn't add wireless-ac and Bluetooth mouse support in this hardware refresh, To nitpick even more, a 13MP or even 20MP rear camera would have been more attractive than 8MP for this price range. I also found its charger, though very cute and small, is also very slow, specially if the Kindle is charging in sleep mode and not in shutdown mode. For that slow charging, maybe Amazon should have added wireless charging as an added feature to cancel out this shortcoming (it will still be slow to charge, but at least it will be a convenient wireless charging :-) ) But this is all nitpicking;  this a 5-star product!If I were to pick the one thing this tablet shines most at, it is, not surprisingly, on the (Kindle) e-reader side. The text-to-speech feature in the reader is a very well done feature...
Reviews.Title: Great tablet for Media, Surfing, and the Amazon ecosystem.

Reviews.Author: Cheryl Bryant
Reviews.Content: The help was printed in very tiny type and could not get it bigger so the help section was very hard to read.  Still have not figured out how to not have another person's notes show up on a book I am reading.  Screen is touchy at times and I end up in places I didn't really want to go to.  The Silk browser was hard to get used to.  Still haven't figured out how to add bookmarks but working on it.  Takes some time to boot up but very quick to shut off, just the opposite of the Paperwhite Kindle I have.  I use the HDX more for the games for the 1st grade student I tutor so the color and sound is great for him.  After a few weeks, I wasn't sorry I bought it but the learning curve was not fun.  I realize this review sounds negative but I do like the HDX but wish I would have known more about how to operate it when I bought it.
Reviews.Title: Very handy once you get the hang of it

Reviews.Author: Larry Garber
Reviews.Content: I love the speed, great display and it's very lightweight, the battery lasts all day.before I purchased the Kindle Fire 8.9" HDX I had a concern that the screen would be to small, not so, it's a great size for home use and travel. I'm using it more now then my laptop. go Kindle fire HDX. I would recommend the Kindle fire HDX 8.9" to anyone that is looking for a tablet or an e-reader. it's awesome.
Reviews.Title: fast, lightweight, and fun.

Reviews.Author: Edward Miller
Reviews.Content: I love the Kindle Fire HDX Display Wi Fi however I wish we had not accepted with Special Offers it just too much distraction. Will be contacting Amazon to see if we can drop "Special Offers".
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX Display WI Fi, 16 GB Includes Special Offers

Reviews.Author: brian
Reviews.Content: I got the kindle fire hdx 8.9  for my grand daughter.  She turned two years old on 7 dec 2013.I was amazed at how light weight it was, and the picture is crystal clear.  The camera on it takesexcellent pictures and  I feel it was well worth the $379.00 I paid for it. I think there are a lot ofapps at the kindle store that will help her improve her learning experience.
Reviews.Title: kindle fire hdx 8.9

Reviews.Author: Angela Bee Bee "angela bee bee"
Reviews.Content: I love the bigger screen, the speed and the mayday button is amazing. I like the integration with Goodreads, you can quote directly from your book to GR, similar to Facebook. There is also a way now to select and copy and paste text from ebooks using the google search tool.Your Goodreads review shows up at the end of the book. The font inside book menus is still way too small and light gray, hard to read (definitions and translations, love the translator too). There is still also no way to customize the screen when reading except for the three colors they had before. I downloaded a screen dim app to dim the screen while reading and use sepia and that seems to help reduce eye strain.I also tried the whole whispersync thing through Audible. It's expensive and confusing but nice if you like to listen to books. The speaker could be louder, but it does have a headphone port.The text to speech works awesome.You can also take a screengrab jpg file by pressing and holding the volume down and power off button at the same time.The only thing I don't like is the lack of Google Apps. You can't even sideload them, it's very proprietary. If you are Amazon friendly, it's no big problem, but it will be annoying for i people to try to switch over. And you have to download a file management browser, like ES file browser to get to your files.I bought mine at Best Buy for $350 in January 2014.I love my new Kindle Fire HDX and can not imagine how I read for so long on my previous gen 7". I am very happy with it.  I got a nice cover and stylus too that work great.Get one for yourself, you will not regret it.
Reviews.Title: Love the Mayday and Goodreads, but no Google Apps

Reviews.Author: lucy laudenbach
Reviews.Content: My kindle does not shut off . I cannot do a thing with it.I had it plugged in rather than battery. I need to know what to do . It must still be under warrenty.
Reviews.Title: Kindle fire HDX will not turn off. What is wrong? What can I do to fix it?

Reviews.Author: billyboy
Reviews.Content: bad sound. My wife has a kindle fire small one it has better sound than my hdx 8.9.  It is hard to download apps and make them work like adobe for an example.  you download it and go to internet and click on things to view and it say to download adobe which I already did.  very touchy.  always have to start over.  I would recommend getting an apple ipad.  Bill.
Reviews.Title: dont like it

Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: So if for example your cable company's app is somewhere else and it likely is NOT on amazon, you can't get it.  It's an incomplete tablet.  If you just want to use it to read, than it's fine.
Reviews.Title: Can only get apps from the amazon store

Reviews.Author: Ginger L. Simons
Reviews.Content: I have had three kindles. All with no problems until purchasing the kindle fire HDX. Half of the time it disconnects from my WiFi and I have to repeatedly reconnect.
Reviews.Title: wifi issues

Reviews.Author: Char Fuller
Reviews.Content: It would have been nice to have written instructions come in the box with the Kindle Fire HDX.  Good overall.
Reviews.Title: manual

Reviews.Author: Keith Barber "Computer Geek"
Reviews.Content: It took me 3 months to choose from the different Kindle models.  Mostly I will use this for reading on a cruise.  The tipping point for me to choose this model was the rear facing 8 megapixel camera.  The fact that it was $40 off in a sale enticed me to get it.
Reviews.Title: Very pleased.  Glad this is my first tablet.

Reviews.Author: Herb Reed
Reviews.Content: My wife likes it very much, it was a gift for her, the only problem she is having, she can not get on facebook, she has tried several times with no luck. Other than that she enjoys it alot
Reviews.Title: Her Kindle Fire HDX 8.9

Reviews.Author: Holly S. Bedard "Holly"
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HDX is all that it claims in HD clarity. I love the portability and it is easy to use.
Reviews.Title: Great clarity of images

Reviews.Author: Kelly L. Kreahling
Reviews.Content: i highly recommend the new 8.9 kindle hdx its very easy to use great display and steaming movies and tv is smooth no interruptions and battery life almost twice my old kindle
Reviews.Title: my new kindle

Reviews.Author: Felipe Amigo
Reviews.Content: There is really nothing to dislike about it, you just have to get used to the launcher (the way it is displayed in comparison to other Android devices).There are many apps that I can sideload, but there are some key one that I use with Google that I would love to use with the Kindle Fire, but it doesn't mean that I don't like it.It is really snappy, slim, great sound, lovely picture, great battery life and well ... just love it!
Reviews.Title: just love it... but man I miss not having the google play store

Reviews.Author: CDF "luv2teach"
Reviews.Content: I love it!  I use it all the time.  I am glad this is what I chose because I find it easy to use. So far, no complaints.  I have had it for 6 months.
Reviews.Title: My KIndle Fire

Reviews.Author: W. Yee "WY"
Reviews.Content: One reason we bought the Kindle is to watch movies on Amazon Prime and have access to more recent movies that you pay for that are otherwise available only on DVD/Blu-Ray.  I believe that Amazon prime only is available on Ipads, computers, streaming boxes, smart TV's but definitely not on Android phones and tablets. The ipad, iPhone, and other I devices are not on my desired list.Amazon doesn't allow many Google apps to be installed such as maps, chrome, gmail (app) that work much better than the substitutes that are at their app store.  The browser app Silk they provide is really terrible.  When you use it to visit the Google search site, it really bogs down to almost not working.  If you use the Netflix app, it hardly works, just spins its wheels.What is disappointing about the Fire HDX is that I had expected the device to improve with time but it hasn't. It's on an island by itself with little reason to listen to its critics.  Though it is an Android device it doesn't take advantage of the large collection of great apps at the Android Play Store.  That makes it less than 2nd place if you consider Android and I devices to be 1 and 2 or 2 and 1.
Reviews.Title: Disappointing in a way that makes it expensive.

Reviews.Author: Oannas
Reviews.Content: A nice product if you don't mind being bumped off the Internet every 10 minutes. Even after buying a new docsis 3 modem, I still lose my connection just as frequently with the Silk browser. The problem persists even after Amazon sent replacement Kindles (one of which was a refurbished model that also turned off just as often).
Reviews.Title: Silk Browser Stinks

Reviews.Author: Robin Stone
Reviews.Content: I have the first Kindle fire and this newer HDX 8.9, if you have the cash spend the money on the 8.9 its a great laptop replacement. The color and speed is excellent.
Reviews.Title: Got it last Christmas and I love it

Reviews.Author: xraylarry
Reviews.Content: I was so excited to get this for my wife.  I would love to give this 5 stars. But, there is a problem with the camera that Kindle knows about and has not fixed.  It was my wife's 50th birthday, and the first thing I wanted to show her was how to use the camera.  We had bought a new Finite Amazon Folio Case and the DigitalsOnDemand 12 item accessory bundle. When the Kindle Fire is in the case and you turn on the camera, there is a message in the middle of the screen that says "slide the kindle up." It stays there the whole time. This is a problem Kindle should easily be able to solve.  In fact there is a work around but you have to do it each time you turn the Kindle off.  Why?  It seems they are forcing you to buy the case that they sell.I will update this rating when Amazon fixes this problem.
Reviews.Title: The Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 camera will not work correctly in the two cases we purchased from Amazon.

Reviews.Author: Elizabeth Taylor
Reviews.Content: I love it!  I use it almost exclusively for reading, the quality of the 'printed' page is great, crisp and easy to see/read.  I have recommended it to many people.
Reviews.Title: I love it!

Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: It arrived on the date that it was expected.  She opened it when she got home from work and started charging it and started checking the books that she had bought while she was waiting for it.  She loved it.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9"

Reviews.Author: Avid Kindle Reader
Reviews.Content: I have not figured it all out yet, but I am working on it.  It will be great when I get it all figured out. This is my sixth Kindle and I love all of them.  My favorites are the larger ones since I read so fast.  Buy it and try it.
Reviews.Title: Myh newest one

Reviews.Author: Charles S. Berg
Reviews.Content: I have had the Kindle fire HD 64 for three weeks and it is an excellent product.  I would give it five stars except that I'm having occasional screen jitters and I can't obtain some of the apps I would like.  Otherwise I am very happy with the device.  Colors and clarity are excellent.  It is fast and easy to use.  I would recommend it to anyone who is interested in a tablet.
Reviews.Title: My new Kindle Fire

Reviews.Author: Hiromi Capelle
Reviews.Content: There are many tablets out there but this has been the best for me.  I have more than one and feel that I kind of wasted my money on some.  I'll give them away and become the best friend in the world.  I guess that it will not become a complete waste of money!  I also have a Kindle Fire D 7" screen with 32 GB and was very happy with that also.  Be sure when you chose your tablet that you chose one that fits your needs.  My need was more for entertainment and this is hands down the best.  For a work or office based tablet I may want to research more and might have chosen another.  What ever your choice I recommend this for entertainment!
Reviews.Title: The best!

Reviews.Author: Andrew Meyer
Reviews.Content: The Kindle does exactly what I wanted it to.  I can download movies/TV Series and watch them on airplanes.  It makes reading much easier and it let's me keep up with email in meetings at work without being distracted by endless chat messages.
Reviews.Title: Great product

Reviews.Author: Michael Huhndorf "Apposite"
Reviews.Content: This unit does it all! For years, various devices have been coming out that do a number of things well but I have never seen it all in one package like the Kindle Fire HDX! It has the web, it takes pictures, you can download books, subscribe to magazines and newspapers, immediately upload pictures to E-mail and  Facebook, Use Skype to speak face to face, print pictures,  take online photos, and play games. The apps are usually minimal in expense and books come with audibe capacity. One major selling  point was the size of the screen. The phones were just too small and I personally had no need for mobile phones.  Land lines suited us well without the extra expense and we had a satellite dish for our PC. I also did not want to go through changing phone numbers. When we do need a mobile phone, the Trac phones were good enough.It is not that I had not wanted something more usable. I was looking for something that  would sit nearby that didn't require being tethered to a chair and screen. this little jewel sits handily nearby and is a joy to use. Finally, the  right technology came along for us.
Reviews.Title: This was the device I was waiting for!

Reviews.Author: Sjfjoky48
Reviews.Content: Very easy to work on and very fast on the internet.  A real necessity to keep handy for surfing, for reading, for games, etc.  Just a delight  to have and use.
Reviews.Title: A Breeze To Work On

Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Ken"
Reviews.Content: I have used the customer service button three times now and have been very impressed with the knowledge and helpfulness of the people I have talked to. It is significantly better to talk to someone than texting or sending emails. I didn't reset the contrast on my screen when I first tried to use it in the sunlight, but after finding out how to do that AI have been very pleased.
Reviews.Title: Love it

Reviews.Author: Susan Kemmerling
Reviews.Content: I use it mostly to read. I use it a lot for my online classes and it works great. I am not the most tech smart person but it is helping me learn and if I need help it is there.
Reviews.Title: does what i need it to

Reviews.Author: J Eric Hoehn
Reviews.Content: Great for reading and entertainment on flights.  Some aps I have on android aren't there for Kindle yet, but I'm hoping they keep adding more.
Reviews.Title: Excellent tablet

Reviews.Author: K. Shortell "knspaint"
Reviews.Content: I haven't owned a Kindle Fire HDX for long, but I love it already.  It is so much easier to use than other tablets I have tried, and it offers everything I need.  I will update this review as I use it more, and learn more about it.  So far, the only thing that I wish that the Kindle had is an expansion slot for micro sd cards.  One thing I really love is the ability to download Amazon Prime instant movies easily  so that I can watch them when wireless connection is not available.
Reviews.Title: Kindle is the best!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Author: Neilson
Reviews.Content: sorry i cant find the "ask question" button, so i write this in review.most of the android device has SD slot for additional memory as i use almost 100GB for picture. for tiny 16g internal memory+5G cloud, it is merely enough for simple apps, some apps even need >1.5G!will drop my note 8 for this if there is a slot for SD card, so sad :(
Reviews.Title: no expandable memory?

Reviews.Author: JTF
Reviews.Content: Not sure if this is a problem due to shipping or just a defective unit, but one of the speakers has a rattling that just won't go away. Just opened up my Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 brand new and wanted to see the quality of the speakers, and one rattles. Besides that.. love it so far! Easy to use/set up, and was happy to see all my Prime content automatically accessible on the device. Didn't purchase the extended warranty, so not sure how to go about sending it back to exchange for a non-defective unit.
Reviews.Title: Busted Speaker On Arrival..

Reviews.Author: Katie
Reviews.Content: The apps could use some work but the overall quality is superb! And the May day feature is so helpful.
Reviews.Title: great picture!

Reviews.Author: robert clifton
Reviews.Content: display was awesome apps were easy to figure out and install and were very plentiful just no phone app and that was a main reason for purchase so i had to return it and go with a phone.
Reviews.Title: good display and lots of features apps were easy

Reviews.Author: H
Reviews.Content: This came lickity split and my husband is convinced I am the best wife ever.... which I am.  Great product.
Reviews.Title: Great Gift

Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I love the Kindle, and especially being able to go on the Internet without going to my computer.  I gave it a 4 because there was so little documentation with it.  I actually do read stuff like that, and it's helpful to someone like me.  I'm "tech-savvy" but not "gadget-savvy."  If there had been more help/documentation, I would have given it a "5".  I would recommend it to anyone except someone who needs a lot of office-type work.
Reviews.Title: It's wonderful

Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I do love my new Kindle HDX, but there is one little flaw that is very annoying, especially when reading a book that illustrations, charts, etc.  I find that in books, and some other applications, the pinch-to-expand android feature will not work.  I recently got $11+ Kindle book with charts and they showed up so small you would need a magnifying glass to see them.  The important info in these charts was unreadable on the HDX.  I had to download the book to my old Samsung tablet so I could expand the material and read it.Other than that one drawback, the HDX is a great tablet.  Very speedy processor, unequaled display.  If you can live without being able to use the pinch-to-expand feature most of the time, then you will be very happy with the Kindle HDX.  BTW, enlarging the print size in settings did not make the material more readable for me.  It's possible there may be a way to PTE to work; I haven't taken time to dig into it yet.
Reviews.Title: Perfect, But Not Quite

Reviews.Author: Randy
Reviews.Content: This device was as expected. It is very fast, downloaded videos, music and books well and the screen is beyond description. Took a little while to adapt to it, from other kindle, but the instant help was fantastic, dare I say awesome? Hate that word as it is overused, but in this case, adept. The little girl that helped us was on the line in less then 10 seconds and answered our question, in less time than that. I had tried to get my answer using the FAQ's but could not find it, but the instant help was a God send. All the required screen movements were outlined by the tech guru. I had to laugh at my wife, as we could see the teckie on our screen as she assisted us, and my wife was standing behind me naked and quickly dived away, as she thought the teckie could see us too. I told her not to worry as the view was only one way. Well, I hope it was only one way, or if not, the teckie got a great view. Believe me, this 8.9 HDX is one great device. If you buy it, you will not be sorry. One more thing, the large storage is a must. We downloaded the entire first season of StarTrek DS9, and it barely used 10% of our memory.
Reviews.Title: Great device

Reviews.Author: Phillip
Reviews.Content: Gave this as a gift but tried it out during setup and was very impressed. The Verizon rep did not want to give it back to us after programming.
Reviews.Title: Great screen resolution

Reviews.Author: ann m greene
Reviews.Content: Love and appreciate the May day feature. I have used this feature and found it extremely helpful,my questions are answered . The technicians are friendly and eager to help.
Reviews.Title: new kindle

Reviews.Author: Lura Claywell "fedepi"
Reviews.Content: I love this kindle fire hdx 8.9. You can do alot with it. Picture is sharp and clear. Love it
Reviews.Title: Love this kindle

Reviews.Author: Matt
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my wife for Valentines day and she loves it. Very well made and we are happy with it.Streams movies fast with my prime account also.
Reviews.Title: great product

Reviews.Author: Judy
Reviews.Content: I am so happy with my new kindle fire HDX 8.9.  I use it every day rather than getting on my desk computer.  The email set up is so efficient and convenient.  I've had the regular kindle fire for a couple of years and was happy with it, but this is so much faster and more fun.  I haven't tried the front camera yet, but the rear camera takes great pictures.  I've used the photo editing and sent the pictures on to friends.  Amazon has really done a great job on this tablet and made it very user friendly.  I was able to.buy it when it was $40 off so the price was exceptionally good.
Reviews.Title: What a wonderful tablet!

Reviews.Author: Linda Starry
Reviews.Content: It is every thing I thought it would be. Can not put it down. I have the Kindle Fire and this is so much better.
Reviews.Title: I love it.

Reviews.Author: THOMAS R HOLBROOK
Reviews.Content: But some fonts to small for my old eyes! Very good apps and the prime membership is g r eat for finding.items to buy!
Reviews.Title: Gret so far

Reviews.Author: Sharon Mcclellan "Garden Nana"
Reviews.Content: The display on this Kindle is awesome.  Even clearer and brighter than my HD tv!  Love the rear facing camera, so easy to take pictures of my grand children in their sports activities.  Very pleased with the Kindle.
Reviews.Title: Very happy with the Kindle HDX 8.9.

Reviews.Author: kato
Reviews.Content: The Kindle is fun and I'm enjoying getting to know it!  So far so good.....I need to figure out how to get the movies from the kindle to my tv....
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9

Reviews.Author: Katherine
Reviews.Content: I would definitely recommend anyone to buy this! Its fantastic!! I love all the books I can get on it.
Reviews.Title: Great reader!!

Reviews.Author: anonymous
Reviews.Content: Tried many tablets, even ones with detachable keyboards, and went back to the one I trust most from  my first one - Kindle. Great product and the quality is superior. Very fast and I love the HD version. Great unit for the price, especially if you're not looking for something for word processing or as your main "laptop" as it is not that, but a great tablet. If you're familiar with the Kindle family, this is a great upgrade.
Reviews.Title: GREAT

Reviews.Author: Bobbie Heaps
Reviews.Content: I'm still getting used to this new Kindle.  I had the regular HD and loved it, but the interface is different with this one.  I've also added a bluetooth mouse which works perfectly.  I miss the easy ability of borrowing books from the Library and I'm not sure I've perfected it with this model.  But this is my 4th Kindle and I'm very happy with the performance and the ability of adding android apps which is why I purchased it.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9

Reviews.Author: Cindy L. Thompson
Reviews.Content: so far everything I have used it for and what I have seen that it can be used for is great, I love the clarity and the vivid colors. I love it and very glad I purchased it
Reviews.Title: My Kindle Fire HDX 8.9"

Reviews.Author: B. Kozloski
Reviews.Content: Although I haave not used all the settings available, I like the ones I use very much.  It is so easy to use.
Reviews.Title: Glad I bought.  I take it with me everywhere I go

Reviews.Author: jacqueline grider
Reviews.Content: Very wonderful new kindle. I just  ordered number 4 kindle! A new e reader to go along with my kidle fire!
Reviews.Title: Another great product

Reviews.Author: Katherine C.
Reviews.Content: Love love love my Kindle Fire HDX 8.9"!!  I went with no ads and 64 GB, it goes everywhere with me.  I have my books, movies, games, facebook, etc. all on that one tablet which is fantastic.  The display is so clear, I love watching movies/shows on it!
Reviews.Title: Love love love!

Reviews.Author: Barbara Ingram
Reviews.Content: I HAVE ENJOYED IT VERY MUCH.  MY GROWN CHILDRED ARE ALSO GOING TO THINK ABOUT BUYING IT.  I WAS DISPOINTED THAT IT WENT ON SALE RIGHT AFTER I BOUGHT IT.
Reviews.Title: GOOD

Reviews.Author: wolfie
Reviews.Content: this kindle fire hdx is one of those things.  my wife has pretty much taken it over but thats ok it keeps her entertained
Reviews.Title: there are somethings that just work well

Reviews.Author: James Miles
Reviews.Content: I bought the Kindle HDX 8.9" for my wife and kids.  She primarily uses is to catch up on her favorite Netflix or Amazon Prime shows - and she loves it.  The screen is brilliant, the controls are simple, and the form is lightweight and elegent.  She takes it all over the house since it so so portable and sturdy.  My boys also use the HDX for their games and for the internet access.  So far so good, I would recommend 8.9" HDX to anyone who is interested in a simple tablet and doesn't need the full computer capability of a laptop or desktop.
Reviews.Title: Wonderful Device

Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I really chose the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" because of the camera. I read many comparsions between IPad  Air and the Kindle Fire HDX 9.8" and they rated equal on some areas, but the camera was rated clearer, etc on the KFire. I really enjoy the weight and the quickness of operation. I would recommend it to anyone that enjoys games, reading, taking pictures and many other good features.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9",

Reviews.Author: generic customer1
Reviews.Content: I had hesitated to purchase a tablet since I have a computer but I liked the idea of reading ebooks instead of having all these paper books. This tablet shows a very clear, crisp & sharp page, easy to read; & no problem to return to the exact place I had stopped reading. Easy & quick to purchase a book; & all the books are on this one tablet. I also enjoy watching all the TED talks on the Kindle; I have no problem hearing & understanding what is said. I'm glad I bought this Kindle Fire.
Reviews.Title: great tablet!

Reviews.Author: maryscopes
Reviews.Content: I love it.  I watched a t.v. show on it, and it is great.  I am still exploring all the things I can do with it.  I love the camera front and back.  I am like a kid with a new toy.  At 68, that is a good thing to have something new to play with.
Reviews.Title: 8.9 Kindle Fire HDX

Reviews.Author: Barbara O. Cassel "Barcee"
Reviews.Content: This is my first android and I am loving it. Very convenient way to keep track of emails when travelling.
Reviews.Title: Beautiful Graffics

Reviews.Author: d a
Reviews.Content: I was given the new Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" by my wonderful husband for Christmas, and I love it!  I had no idea how much I would enjoy it.  I have downloaded games, accessed my email, etc.  It is easy to use, it has a beautiful screen, I've accessed the online chat "help", which was also great.
Reviews.Title: Love My Kindle Fire!

Reviews.Author: denise hoffman
Reviews.Content: I ABSOLUTELY LOVE MY KINDLE FIRE HDX 8.9. THIS IS THE FIRST NOTEBOOK I'VE EVER HAD. GREAT COLOR SCREEN. I LOVE THE SIZE. IT'S LIGHT WEIGHT. EASY TO USE. I LIKE THE MAYDAY OPTION BECAUSE I'M NOT GREAT WITH COMPUTERS.
Reviews.Title: KINDLE FIRE HDX 8.9

Reviews.Author: G. Thompson
Reviews.Content: Great clarity in the new technology for the display.  Easy to use with new features causing thetablet to offer help even when no help is requested.  I have a first generation Fire and loved it too.This one is better in every way, sound, display, function.  Love reading on it (my first love), but alsonow love going to the web, webcam, games, videos, my personal photos....Truly worth all myanxiety about getting a new reader/tablet.  I love it!
Reviews.Title: I love it!

Reviews.Author: Kenneth
Reviews.Content: The HD quality is amazing,  love the 8.9" screen and the one touch help with face talk is awesome, thanks Amazon!
Reviews.Title: I got mine, what are you waiting for? :-)

Reviews.Author: Ruby "RNR "history fan""
Reviews.Content: Pictures are sharp & clear. Wish there was a Zoom Feature.Not supporting Adobe Flash Player is the biggest letdown. I can't view anyone's video's on facebook. The bigger screen is much better and the wi-fi & Verizon support is great.
Reviews.Title: Love It except it does not support Adobe Flash

Reviews.Author: Jill Nagle
Reviews.Content: I have looked for two years at all the tablets as they appeared on the store shelves. This is the first tablet that did everything I wanted and is fast. The battery lasts for 12 hours just like advertised. It is my "go to" minny computer and my reader all in one. I appreciate the thought that went into all the desin features. Particularly the reading features. Now I can adjust the back lighting to white or black, zoom in and out or c change the text font very quickly and easily. I am very happy with my new toy. Oh, did I mention how much I enjoy watching movies on my Kindle. And it takes a very clear photo from front or back. Thank you Amazon.
Reviews.Title: Kindle FIRE HDX 8.9"

Reviews.Author: Rob Hanna
Reviews.Content: Absolutely love everything about it! Easy to use, great resolution, lightweight! So easy to download books, apps, etc. I take it everywhere.
Reviews.Title: Absolutely love everything about it!

Reviews.Author: Petr
Reviews.Content: Engineering masterpiece. For such price this is the best tablet on market. Easy to use, good battery life, awesome screen and amazon features!
Reviews.Title: God bless America!

Reviews.Author: cboo1970
Reviews.Content: I don't have much to say except I love my HDX. I use it more than my computer and I use it for everything. If you are looking for a tablet, you can't go wrong with it.
Reviews.Title: Love it!!

Reviews.Author: Carol Weeks "Carol Weeks Speaks!"
Reviews.Content: My first Kindle was 2nd generation, so this was quite a change for me.  The colors are brilliant.  I keep expecting something I'm watching to jump out into my lap!  Love the apps.  Battery charge is very good, but of course, games eat up the battery pretty quickly.  I was able to load my e-mail, facebook, twitter, etc. very easily.  Books are wonderful to read and I love the highlight function.  I like the size of it and the weight.  I bought a beautiful Belkin cover that fits it perfectly.  I bought the cover in the Kindle store.  The speed is incredible. It is instantly on and ready to go.  The camera takes excellent pictures, although it's a bit bulky to actually take the pictures.  I'm used to a much smaller phone with camera.
Reviews.Title: Love at First Sight!

Reviews.Author: Timothy D Parker
Reviews.Content: Great device great hardware software is restrictive for customization....home screen you can't change the background, permanently change the carousel or turn it off. I don't mind the special offers but they don't open the device to it's fullest. If you have a decent idea what you want to do in a tablet and know how to use it don't get this one. If you want a tablet that just works "Mac style" with out the cost get this one. If you have enough devices to do what you want with any how (like myself) this is a great addition to the arsenal.
Reviews.Title: Great Device
